$100 [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ndrc-em-nov24?refcode=don_ndrc_tier1_email_NorthCarolina_email_20241101-NDRC-Tier1-NorthCarolina_&utm;_source=email&utm;_medium=email&utm;_term=don&utm;_content=20241101-NDRC-Tier1-NorthCarolina_&utm;_campaign=NorthCarolina&express;_lane=true&amount;=100]Another amount [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ndrc-em-nov24?refcode=don_ndrc_tier1_email_NorthCarolina_email_20241101-NDRC-Tier1-NorthCarolina_&utm;_source=email&utm;_medium=email&utm;_term=don&utm;_content=20241101-NDRC-Tier1-NorthCarolina_&utm;_campaign=NorthCarolina&express;_lane=true] Theelection happening in just a few days will help shape the future of fair mapsfor North Carolinians. We’ve proudly endorsed Justice Allison Riggs for theNorth Carolina Supreme Court because she has proven to be a fair-minded andindependent voice on the court. She is a tenacious civil rights attorney whohas been a champion of every American’s fundamental rights, including votingrights. By re-electing Justice Riggs and getting new pro-democracy leaders onthe North Carolina Supreme Court, we can pave the way for fair maps that giveeveryone in the state a fair chance to make their voices heard. And we canstand against GOP gerrymanderers who will keep trying to dilute the will ofthe people. This election is just one of hundreds we’ve identified across thecountry where your support can make an outsized impact to defend ourdemocracy. State-level races often come down to thin margins, and so we needyour help to reach every voter we can between now and November 5th. Donatetoday to help us keep up the fight. Forward this email with thestakes in this election. The last day of early voting is this Saturday,November 2!DONATE [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ndrc-em-nov24?refcode=don_ndrc_tier1_email_NorthCarolina_email_20241101-NDRC-Tier1-NorthCarolina_&utm;_source=email&utm;_medium=email&utm;_term=don&utm;_content=20241101-NDRC-Tier1-NorthCarolina_&utm;_campaign=NorthCarolina&amount;=]https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ndrc-em-nov24?refcode=don_ndrc_tier1_email_NorthCarolina_email_20241101-NDRC-Tier1-NorthCarolina_&utm;_source=email&utm;_medium=email&utm;_term=don&utm;_content=20241101-NDRC-Tier1-NorthCarolina_&utm;_campaign=NorthCarolina&amount;=[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ndrc-em-nov24?refcode=don_ndrc_tier1_email_NorthCarolina_email_20241101-NDRC-Tier1-NorthCarolina_&utm;_source=email&utm;_medium=email&utm;_term=don&utm;_content=20241101-NDRC-Tier1-NorthCarolina_&utm;_campaign=NorthCarolina&amount;=] Since 2017, theNDRC has executed a comprehensive redistricting strategy that shifts theredistricting power, creating fair districts where Democrats can compete. Ourvictories have been made possible by our strong community of grassrootssupporters. MAKE A DONATION [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ndrc-em-nov24?refcode=don_ndrc_tier1_email_NorthCarolina_email_20241101-NDRC-Tier1-NorthCarolina_&utm;_source=email&utm;_medium=email&utm;_term=don&utm;_content=20241101-NDRC-Tier1-NorthCarolina_&utm;_campaign=NorthCarolina&amount;=] If you want toreceive periodic updates from the NDRC on our fight for fair maps, text MAPSto 36787. Text HELP for help, STOP to end. Msg & Data rates may apply. PrivacyPolicy. [https://democraticredistricting.com/privacy-policy/] We know we senda lot of emails, but we think it's important to keep you updated with thelatest information on Republican gerrymandering and voter suppression and howwe're fighting back -- regardless of whether you choose to donate. name: Team Tina
subject: Trump is not a “protector” of women
body: Folks — Donald Trump and the GOP are absolutely fixated on controlling women’sbodies. From restricting abortion access to opposing in-vitro fertilization,it seems like Republican leaders think they know women’s bodies better thanwomen themselves. To that, Tina says: Mind your damn business. While Trumpclaims to be a “protector” of women, his policies and vicious rhetoric provethe opposite — he is standing in the way of women’s rights and freedoms.Tina’s had enough — that’s why she’s doing all she can to elect leaders whoare pro-women, like Vice President Kamala Harris and Governor Tim Walz. body: Democrat Eric Swalwellrepresents California's 14th Congressional District. https://ericswalwell.com/[https://ericswalwell.com/] Friend — November??? Wow. It's been one hell of aride. I genuinely couldn't have done this work without your support. Thank youfor your never-ending dedication, passion, and support over these past fewweeks. We're now literally DAYS away from the election. The work we've put intogether — you've put in — will decide whether or not we can put an end to theMAGA circus that's taken over Washington. It's not easy fighting a bunch offar-right extremists day in and day out. The MAGA agenda is dangerous — whichis why our work is so important. I'm glad to say that we've made it throughOctober. name: David Pan
subject: Changing our system one step at a time
body: Help me to transform our relation to government                           [1]Hopefully, you have learned about my plan to phase out our welfare andentitlement programs to replace them with a universal basic income of $16,000per year for everyone 21 and over. Even if you don’t agree with all thedetails, we need to start discussing solutions to the problems that my planwill solve: a dysfunctional welfare system, the looming insolvency of SocialSecurity and Medicare, and our mounting national debt. Right now, I am theonly one even attempting to think about these crucial issues and offering apossible plan. It is of course an ambitious plan, and things will obviouslynot change overnight, and if elected I would only be able to take the firststeps toward the discussions that would lead to such solutions. But with yoursupport, I can start on the work of turning our country around. Without it, wewill have to wait that much longer to have these discussions, and meanwhileour debts will keep increasing, making solutions that much more difficult toimplement. Please add your voice to mine so that we can start on the processof real transformation that will change all of our lives, returning to us ourfreedom and prosperity. If you have not voted, please do so. Please alsoconsider a donation to my campaign. My ads have begun running on southernCalifornia TV stations, on streaming video, through text messages, and throughsocial media. You can also see my ad on my website at DavidPanforCongress.com[2]. Now is the time that I need your help to achieve these goals for you andyour family. Help me by contributing $5, $10, $100, which can go directly intospreading my message more broadly on these platforms. Dear dPwillis67@gmail.com,

Thank you for your support of the Democratic Party of Georgia.

As you know, our state has a rich history of fighting for change and progress. But we need your help to continue this legacy. Your contributions enable us to support candidates who share our values and fight for the issues that matter most to Georgians. 

With your donation, we can make a difference in the upcoming election. Whether it's a one-time contribution or a monthly recurring gift, every dollar counts towards building momentum for Democratic candidates.

If you prefer not to receive these emails, please click here to unsubscribe. 

Thank you again for your support. Together, we can make Georgia a better place for all.

Sincerely,
The Democratic Party of Georgia Team

Republicans are doubling down ontheir efforts to suppress our voices and sway the outcome of this election. Sonow, Stacey is standing strong with us as we launch our Ride for Democracyprogram to offer free rides to the polls for Georgia voters on Election Day.But we need to raise $20,000 to help fund our efforts to ensure that everyonecan reach the polls on November 5th. So will you please chip in $10 to helpfund the Democratic Party of Georgia’s Ride for Democracy program?[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ga_rides?amount=] If you've saved yourpayment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go throughimmediately: DONATE $ NOW »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ga_rides?amount=&express;_lane=true] DONATE$ NOW »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ga_rides?amount=&express;_lane=true] DONATE$ NOW »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ga_rides?amount=&express;_lane=true] DONATE$ NOW »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ga_rides?amount=&express;_lane=true] DONATE$ NOW »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ga_rides?amount=&express;_lane=true]ANOTHER AMOUNT » [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ga_rides] — DemocraticParty of Georgia HQ P.S. We’ve attached Stacey’s original message below if youwant to see! ----- Forwarded Message -----https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ga_rides[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ga_rides] Peter: We’re just four days awayfrom Election Day, and the stakes couldn’t be higher. With polls showing razorthin margins and Republicans doubling down on their efforts to suppress ourvoices, we must fight back to build historic momentum for Democrats. I’vededicated my career to defending voting rights because I believe everyonedeserves to be heard at the ballot box. That’s why I’m proud to stand with theDemocratic Party of Georgia as they launch their vital initiative to providefree rides to the polls for voters on Election Day. Your support will helpensure that no Georgian is left behind, and will fuel our fight against theGOP’s ongoing voter suppression tactics. name: Sen. Jon Tester
subject: the difference between winning and losing
body: Folks, getting a flat tire now would be disastrous for our campaign. Can Icount on you to split $10 to my campaign and Jacky Rosen’s in the next 24hours?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/rosenfornevada_tester?refcode=jtk5363-fr-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 Asking for money is one of the worst parts ofthe job – but with the election in four days, I hope you’ll understand why I’mreaching out. We have a major fundraising goal at midnight tonight, and it’scrucial that we reach our targets. Mitch McConnell and his buddies are lookingfor any signs of vulnerabilities. If we miss our fundraising goal, we’ll haveto pull down our ads and open the door for even more outside spending fromMcConnell’s super PACs. With the race so close, those ads could mean thedifference between winning and losing this race. I wouldn’t ask if it wasn’turgent, folks. Will you make a split donation of whatever you can give to helpus hit our goal and win Montana’s Senate race?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/rosenfornevada_tester?refcode=jtk5363-fr-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 Thank you, Jon -------- This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Jacky Rosen
subject: you there?
body: Are you there? I’m sorry to send another email, but my worst nightmare isbecoming a reality. Donald Trump just held another nasty rally in Nevadayesterday, and I have nowhere else to turn.Can you split $25 between mycampaign and Defeat Boebert PAC to help me combat the GOP’s attacks and getacross the finish line? Trump did not hold back. He directly attacked me onstage, saying I’m a “horrible person” and a “radical left lunatic.” And hegave my MAGA opponent a platform to lie about my record in front of thousandsof voters. Listen - I won’t let childish name-calling get under my skin. I’mthe most vulnerable woman in the Senate during a year where abortion rightsare on the line, so I know what it’s like to face an onslaught of GOP insults.But the truth is Trump and my opponent are ramping up their attacks against mein these final days and the GOP’s TOP super PAC just poured $6.2 million moreinto my race with one goal:to defeat me. If we can’t beat them to the punchand reach thousands of undecided voters as soon as possible, we risk losingthe Democratic Senate majority and the White House. So please, can you make a$25 donation split between my campaign and Defeat Boebert PAC before it’s toolate? I need *your* help to defeat Donald Trump and defend our DemocraticSenate and White House. If you've saved your payment information with ActBlueExpress, your donation will go through immediately: RUSH IN $25 RUSH IN $50RUSH IN $100 RUSH IN $250 RUSH IN $500 RUSH ANOTHER AMOUNT Thank you,Jacky Rosen DONATE Paid for by Defeat Boebert PAC This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com . name: Theresa Boisseau
subject: Second Chance - Free Viewing of Zurawski v Texas
body: I HIGHLY recommend you watch this documentary this weekend. View this email inyour browser (https://mailchi.mp/987033b5a265/amanda-zurawski-vs-texas-12709419?e=ebba716312) https://www.theresa4texas.com Hi Friend, ** Ifyou didn't get a chance to watch the documentary, Zurawski v Texas, I HIGHLYrecommend you watch it this weekend.------------------------------------------------------------ ** The Center forReproductive Rights sums it up:------------------------------------------------------------ "In the newdocumentary feature film Zurawski v Texas, independent filmmakers Maisie Crowand Abbie Perrault show the stark and terrifying reality of what it means tobe pregnant in a U.S. state that has banned abortion—and the bravery, grit anddetermination that it takes to speak out. Crow and Perrault followed threeTexas women who were denied medically necessary abortion care—Amanda Zurawski,Samantha Casiano, and Dr. Austin Dennard—as they brought their stories andbattled their case up to the Texas Supreme Court, with the help of the Centerfor Reproductive Rights’ Senior Staff Attorney Molly Duane." Watch Zurawski vTexas for free Nov 2 and 3 here(https://watch.eventive.org/togetherfilms/play/670db1d13a247100e803df13/670db1dc3f8905002cc42691)** If you are able to give, I am sure the Center for Reproductive Rights coulduse your donation.------------------------------------------------------------ Donate the theCenter for Reproductive Rights here (https://reproductiverights.org/) Theyhave cases across the country and could use our support while they fightagainst the extreme abortion bans that put women's lives in jeopardy. ** Ifyou haven't voted yet, today is the last day of early voting and Tuesday isElection Day. ------------------------------------------------------------Thanks for your help. ** Onwards,------------------------------------------------------------ ** Theresa------------------------------------------------------------ Donate(https://secure.actblue.com/donate/abrighterfuturefortexas) Volunteer(https://www.theresa4texas.com/get-involved) Issues(https://www.theresa4texas.com/what-theresa-stands-for) Shop(https://store.theresa4texas.com) https://www.theresa4texas.com Follow me onsocial media - and share with your friends and family!https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61552530122152https://www.instagram.com/theresa4texas https://www.twitter.com/theresa4texashttps://tiktok.com/theresa4texashttps://www.youtube.com/channel/UCyd_ZE7lgKTjDchvDRg4A9g Pol. Ad paid for byTheresa4Texas. Copyright (C) 2024 Theresa4Texas All rights reserved. Ourmailing address is: PO Box 200759, Austin, TX 78720 info@theresa4texas.com(mailto:info@theresa4texas.com?subject=&body;=) www.theresa4texas.com Want tochange how you receive these emails? name: John James HQ - War Room
subject: Crisis point
body: Friend, We’re at a crisis point. There’s no other way to say this, but wefailed. Right now, we’re DANGEROUSLY short of where we need to be in ourfundraising if we’re going to re-elect John James and defend our Housemajority. There are only FOUR DAYS left until Election Day, and this is ourlast chance to make things right. This is urgent. name: Dr. Raul Ruiz
bio: The son of hardworking farmworkers, Dr. Ruiz grew up in Coachella, CA and learned at an early age that the key to attaining the American Dream is hard work and a great education. In the summer of 1990, Raul walked in the desert heat from business to business in the Coachella Valley asking them to invest in their community by contributing to his education. With each investment for college, he made a promise to come back home and serve his community as a physician.
goals: To continue fighting for us in Congress and to flip the House blue this November.

name: Nella Domenici
subject: Fired up!
body: Nella for Senate We’re on the cusp of flipping New Mexico red and electing new leadership that will secure our border, lower our cost of living, get tough on crime, improve education, and unleash our abundant natural resources. I’m fired up, Peter! The energy at President Trump’s rally in Albuquerque today was palpable. I could feel it on stage while delivering my own remarks, and it was apparent to anyone who was there todaythat something special is happening in New Mexico. We’re on the cusp of flipping this state red and electing new leadership that will secure our border, lower our cost of living, get tough on crime, improve education, and unleash our abundant natural resources. I need you to keep fighting every single day, every single moment, until the polls close on Tuesday. Our campaign is working 24/7 to reach remaining undecided voters and get out the vote. We need to keep resources flowing into this campaign to ensure our funding for these operations doesn’t run dry. Your $5 or $10 contribution, in addition to your vote, is needed to help us secure more votes. Please chip in anything you can, and let’s win this thing! Let's Flip New Mexico RED! Thank you, Nella Domenici ABOUT NELLA New Mexico is Nella Domenici’s home. She was born in Albuquerque and lived for most of her childhood in a home near the intersection of Lomas and Monroe with her seven siblings, and her parents - Pete and Nancy Domenici. Nella began her education at Our Lady of Fatima, where she learned the values she holds today. Nella is a proud third-generation New Mexican, devoted mother of two, step-mom of four, and the wife of a Navy Veteran. Nella’s family’s roots run deep in New Mexico and she and her husband Pat enjoy their family home in New Mexico that they have owned for nearly twenty years. Like most New Mexicans, Nella Domenici understands the importance of hard work. She waited tables to help pay for her undergraduate degree from Georgetown University, and worked her way through night school at Georgetown Law while holding down a full time job. She then graduated from Harvard Business School as a Baker Scholar, top 5% of the class, while 9 months pregnant. Nella began her career at the bottom and worked her way up through the complex finance world, eventually serving as CFO for one of the world’s largest, most successful investment firms. In her career, Nella advised, invested in, grew, and led many companies, and served on public company boards. The industries she has worked in are vast and include areas such as health care, AI, food service, lodging, commercial real estate, mortgage lending, and consumer products. These companies have ranged from small family-owned businesses, to rapidly growing venture backed enterprises, to a Fortune 200 company. Several of these have been headquartered in New Mexico. Collectively, the companies Nella has been heavily involved with have employed thousands of Americans. Like her father and mother, Nella has been a warrior for those who most need an advocate: for women competing in academics or business, for families dealing with mental illness, and for those without access to quality healthcare or education. JOIN NELLA Follow Nella Online Checks can be made payable to Nella for Senate and mailed to PO Box 92918 | Albuquerque, NM 87199 Paid for by Nella for Senate Don't want to receive any more of our emails? We hate to see you go: unsubscribe .

name: Wes Moore
subject: What it means to make history
body: http://secure.actblue.com/donate/loc_lbr_fr_q42024 [http://secure.actblue.com/donate/loc_lbr_fr_q42024] Hey there, it’s Wes Moore. I wanted to talk about my friend, Lisa Blunt Rochester, who's currently running to be Delaware’s next senator. I’m so grateful to have the opportunity to talk about someone who will make meaningful change for everyday people like you. Take it from me, I understand the importance of having a people-powered campaign. Moreover, we’ve both come from humble beginnings. We know what it means to dig in deep to do the hard, meaningful work, and giving back to our communities is a value we both hold close to our hearts. And at a time when we’re more divided than ever, coming together to find common-sense solutions and leadership in the Senate is more important than ever. And with the Democratic Senate majority on the line in November, your grassroots support is crucial to making that a reality. So please, consider donating $25 or more today to help us make history again by helping me elect Lisa Blunt Rochester into the U.S. Senate as Delaware's first Black and woman Senator. name: Zoe Lofgren
subject: Heading out to vote
body: # [#] Election Day is just 4 days away. It’s hard to believe, but I wanted toreach out and ensure you’re prepared to head to the polls on Tuesday. Here’sall the information on same day registration, poll locations and additionalvoting information for California. [https://www.sos.ca.gov/elections?%5D=] .This is the most critical Election of our lives, which makes it more importantthan ever that we get out there to the polls and encourage the people aroundus to do the same. Your voice matters, and it’s important that you get outthere and exercise your right to vote! See you at the polls! — ZoeCongresswoman Zoe Lofgren is a strong fighter for California’s values inWashington. As the Chair of the California Democratic CongressionalDelegation, she has been on the front lines of expanding and protecting theDemocratic Majority. Zoe has dedicated her career to fighting for our diversecommunities and needs your help. Click here to donate to Zoe’s campaign →[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/zlem?refcode=emfooter&amount;=10&recurring;=auto]PAID FOR BY LOFGREN FOR CONGRESS Click here to unsubscribe.[https://secure.ngpvan.com/p/ajUQo4ybxU21ST3ml0ekxQ2?unsubscribedata=D9W%2BPaeMPrEAIW22CMY8k3qlgGa894637aPNuRYlX7GVtF7NQDFXnzq7yUrtT6UR9OFaFTg30ZzvDwtNecCoh%2BYLsUwsLA5%2FUn9ZdxFjyQwMPTXhs27ObfUSI6VTZaV8NwLZlksuRUSYQZXiAgLc6rtzYOjWvffdDe6s8HhdGwtp83V1o%2BEIpkz4ZSyWrV3uDRtOJ9quAZMXy7pa1oWfwMR6rlYsiOBGYQibnOzUWzcWhDfMALIabSg5NJTaCrjUQDkbfzGL5tK0TJJFoMrEJjTgHLmaZVvgbkgcSkbJkH%2FlyuF4Kj0hgZ72dxQ9HVNxyeVftxRp3jV9ReACrlAQTrAtMyWyyFLbY3KfZkSztvcVwDxZbHtRMQPzf6zSujq3nl3Sym839YIqBsnZ5Xh%2Bj5f9okiaEgMtaubYXgkaoxc%3D]Lofgren for Congress PO Box 913 San Jose, CA 95113 United States

name: Senate Republicans
subject: We have the opportunity
body: NRSC Five winnable neck-and-neck races will be decided by undecided andindependent voters on Election Day, and Senate Republicans need your help tosecure victory. We are less than a week from Election Day, and Senate racesare SHIFTING in states like Montana, Ohio, Wisconsin, and Pennsylvania. FellowAmerican, we cannot take anything for granted, even if ratings favorRepublicans. But politics can be unpredictable, and this year is no exception.– Roll Call 10/29 Many of these critical Senate races are going to come downto thousands of votes. • In 2022, Adam Laxalt lost by only 7,902 votes. • In2020, Congresswoman Miller–Meeks won her election by just six votes. That'swhy it's so foolish when people say their votes do not count. They do! TheSenate majority will come down to the wire. We cannot afford to take anythingfor granted – especially with so many close races and the chance to retireDemocrat Senators inMontana, Ohio, Wisconsin, and Pennsylvania. It's up to usto help push them over the finish line. Please donate to help. Thank you,Senate Republicans FLIP THE SENATE >> If you want to help Republicans TAKEBACK THE SENATE, text WIN to 55404 to receive mobile alerts! Message and datarates may apply. Text "STOP" to opt-out. T&C;/Privacy Policy. Paid for by theNRSC. Not authorized by any candidate or candidate's committee. www.NRSC.orgContributions to the NRSC are not deductible as charitable contributions forfederal income tax purposes. name: Emilia Sykes
subject: In 4 days, the election will be over.
body: Peter, it’s Emilia. We are just four days out from the election. Voters aremaking their plans to vote, heading to the polls, and returning their ballots.This is crunch time! Since we only have four days left, I want to give you abreakdown on where this race stands right now. I'll explain more, but we needall the help we can get. Can you please pitch in $5 or whatever you can todayto help fuel our movement?https://secure.actblue.com/donate/sykesq42024?&amount;=5&refcode;=em_fr_2024.11.01_b1_es_allRight now, we are up against the millions that Republicans are spendingagainst me in an attempt to flip this seat. We only have four days left tomake sure this team is strong enough to go toe-to-toe with their deep pockets.Only four more days to combat the attack ads trying to hide my record ofworking across the aisle to deliver for Northeast Ohioans. Just four days toreach as many voters as possible in OH-13 to let them know what this movementis all about and that I am fighting for this hardworking community. Peter, wehave a lot of work to do, and any amount you can pitch in makes a hugedifference on this grassroots team.https://secure.actblue.com/donate/sykesq42024?&amount;=5&refcode;=em_fr_2024.11.01_b1_es_allI am working to bring jobs back to our communities, keep more money in thepockets of hardworking families, and protect reproductive freedoms. There isjust too much on the line, and we can't afford to fall short. Can I pleasecount on you to help us out in these final four days?https://secure.actblue.com/donate/sykesq42024?&amount;=5&refcode;=em_fr_2024.11.01_b1_es_allThank you so much, Emilia Sykes -------------------- A native of Akron, Ohio,Emilia Sykes has deep roots fighting for Ohioans. She learned from a young agehow to use her voice and the power of the people to create change. In 2022,Congresswoman Sykes was elected to represent Ohio’s newly redrawn 13thCongressional District, winning one of the toughest races in the country.Emilia has cut through the divisiveness to deliver results. name: Indiana Democrats
subject: One million Hoosiers (and Saturday voting)
body: [https://prod.cdn.everyaction.com/images/van/NGP/NGP03/1/67635/images/IDP%20logo.jpg]Peter, We have some good news for you on this Friday – as of this week, over1,000,000 Hoosiers have voted! Will you chip in to ensure millions moreHoosiers can cast their ballot before polls close at 6 PM Tuesday?[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/indems] Tomorrow will be one of the biggestdays of this election. Early voting is open in every one of Indiana’s 92counties. Tell your friends, family, and neighbors that they can votetomorrow, and to go to indianavoters.in.gov [http://indianavoters.in.gov] tofind their polling place and hours. That’s an incredible pace, and we’reexcited that so many Hoosiers are coming out to the polls in this close andcritical election. However, too many voters across Indiana have had to wait orhaven’t had the chance to vote because of long lines. Our volunteers and teammembers are out every day working to protect the vote by making sure Hoosiersknow their rights, where to vote, and what to bring. name: Rebecca Cooke
subject: Thank you, Peter.
body: Peter, I wanted to say thank you for helping us close October strong. Yourcontinued grassroots support helped us blow away our expectations and hit ourstretch goal when we needed it most. We’re on the doorstep of making history,and we couldn’t be here without the energy you’ve given us every step of theway. Now, we’re into our final weekend, and we need one last sprint. I’m readyto finish what we started in 2022, and if we can keep up this pace, we will.If you’ve not given yet, supporting our final weekend of getting out the voteis the perfect time to make your impact felt. Please chip in $3 today.Donate>> https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cooke-q4-2024?refcode=em-11.1.24-all-aFrom the bottom of my heart, thank you for your continued support. Rebecca ###Paid for by Cooke for Congress Cooke for Congress PO Box 1846 Eau Claire, WI54702 United States Rebecca Cooke is a small business and nonprofit leader whohas focused her career on building community and serving others. She was bornand raised on an Eau Claire dairy farm and was appointed by Governor TonyEvers to the Wisconsin Economic Development Corporation. If you'd like to makea contribution to support her grassroots campaign, please chip in here. name: April McClain Delaney
subject: 4 days to go!
body: Peter, We’re in the final stretch until Election Day with 4 days to go! Here’sthe deal: National Republicans are coming to Neil Parrott’s rescue–pouring inresources into attacks against me. Just last week, he was fundraisingalongside Stephen Moore, who infamously criticized the Violence Against WomenAct, labeling vital support for survivors as “pork.” That’s why we’re workingso hard to meet voters face to face. From now until Election Day, we need yoursupport to do so. That’s why we’re setting up a Get-Out-The-Vote fund to helpus with emergency expenses in the coming days. I know we have the power totake on Neil Parrott and his extremist agenda at the polls this Tuesday. name: Ashley Ehasz
subject: Thank you
body: First: I want to start off with a huge THANK YOU. I sign off every email with"thanks for being in this fight with me as my co-pilot" – and I MEAN IT. Justlike no one in the Army works alone, there's no way to run for office alone.It takes an entire team of volunteers, donors, and staff. I still can't fullygrasp that tens of thousands of people have my back every day. And I amgrateful for each and every one of you. Second: Even though we just closed thebooks on October, we have a goal of raising $20,000 from grassroots donorsbetween now and Election Day. So can you please pitch in – even if you'vealready done so recently? DONATE [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/eha-email-nov2024?refcode=em_fl_eha_20241101_fr_eomty_cand_mf_30da_s1_pt] I also want tomake sure that as my co-pilot, you know exactly what the campaign's been upto. Because we’ve been doing a LOT. Here's a quick run down: Organizing VoterTurnout Last weekend we… >> Broke our record for number of voters' doorsknocked >> Had so many volunteers that we had to turn our parking lot intooverflow space >> Gave out all of our walk packets for the whole weekend onDay 1 – so we've expanded the number of voters we're reaching out to >> Werejoined by Gov. Josh Shapiro And yesterday, Bucks County had a special visitfrom Tim Walz! Fundraising I'm proud to say that we reached our Octobergrassroots fundraising goal in the nick of time! A whopping 87% of ourfundraising comes from individual donations – NOT special interests likecorporate PACs. And we proved exactly how strong we are by outraising BrianFitzpatrick last quarter and setting a new record for Democratic fundraisingin PA-01. Ads The final case we're making to voters is Fitzpatrick's anti-choice record that has made women second-class citizens in this country. Andyes, I'm so fed up, I'm cursing in our ad.[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zdb-z9KJqV0] What's Next We have just 4 DAYSLEFT until Election Day. And this weekend is our last big Get Out The Votepush to turn out our friends and neighbors to the polls. Our goal is toshatter more records and welcome some big names to Pennsylvania in these finaldays! And of course, we need to raise that $20,000 to make sure we can keepour ads up and field offices resourced in these final days. Please rush $10 orwhatever you can afford to raise this last bit >>[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/eha-email-nov2024?refcode=em_fl_eha_20241101_fr_eomty_cand_mf_30da_s1_pt] Thanks forbeing in this fight with me as my co-pilot, Ashley 🚁 Paid for by Ehasz forCongress Ehasz for Congress 1800 Byberry Road #1336 Bensalem, PA 19020 UnitedStates Ashley Ehasz is a former member of the U.S. Army. Use of her militaryrank, job titles, and photographs in uniform does not imply endorsement fromthe Department of Defense or the Department of the Army. Inbox overcrowded butwant to stay updated on big news? Get less email – we'll send you about 2emails per week [https://secure.ngpvan.com/jpXqs-3mz0a7WjAoIC5fRw2]. name: Donald Trump Jr.
subject: Speaker Johnson’s request
body: Peter, If you’re like me, you know that the most important thing we can dothis year for our country is sending my father back to the White House. Butwhat’s equally important is ensuring that he has an army of America Firstwarriors in Congress to back him up! Help build our strategy! SpeakerJohnson and I are working tirelessly with just 4 days remaining to make surethat we win theFULL TRIFECTA this November. Can you take a few minutes torespond to the Speaker’s 2024 Election Survey and share your thoughts with usso we can build the ultimate operation? RESPOND NOW This isn’t just any oldsurvey. It’s a CRUCIAL factor in ensuring we have all the information we needto build our final strategy. So, Peter, can I count on you to respond? Thanks,Donald Trump Jr. Paid for by Mike Johnson for Louisiana Unsubscribe |Mark asJunk

name: OKGOP
subject: It’s
body: Peter, early voting is continuing in Oklahoma today & tomorrow. And we needall Republicans to get out & vote. The times early voting is available today(Friday) is 8:00 am to 6:00 pm & tomorrow you can early vote during the hoursof 8:00 am to 2:00 pm. If you aren’t sure where early voting happens in yourcounty, you can find out here . One of the most impactful votes you will castis on the THREE State Supreme Court judges on the ballot for retention. Thevoters in Oklahoma are being asked “should these judges be retained on theOklahoma Supreme Court?” And the answer is NO, they should not be retained!You’ve heard plenty about the Presidential Election, and voting straight partyRepublican will restore our economy, but we MUST get rid of these liberaljudges. All three judges are very liberal (check out the score card made byOCPA scoring their liberal records ) by clicking here , and they were allappointed by Democrat Governors. They’ve constantly legislated from the benchwith their decisions in order to force their liberal agenda on the people ofOklahoma. For more information on these judges & the other judges on theballot please visit OKGOP.com/judges/ . There you can download a pdf to printat home, email to your family & friends, or distribute however you choose.Other groups have now engaged as well encouraging their people to vote NO onthese judges. We can’t afford more years of liberal activist judges forcingtheir leftist agenda on our State. Tell everyone you know to VOTE NO on allthree Oklahoma Supreme Court judges. The easiest way to remember it is: thesethree liberal Supreme Court judges MUST go, so we all must vote NO! Say NO toEdmondson, Gurich, & Kauger. -Team OKGOP -=-=- Paid for by OKGOP and notauthorized by any candidate or candidate's committee. www.OKGOP.com - (405)528-3501. 4031 N. Linconln Blvd., Oklahoma City, OK 73105 This email was sentto dpwillis67@gmail.com. To stop receiving emails:https://okgop.nationbuilder.com/unsubscribe -=-=- Created with NationBuilder -https://nationbuilder.com/

name: Liz Walters, ODP Chair
subject: Tuesday will be here before we know it.
body: I want to say thank you, team. Every time we’ve sent out the call for help tothis grassroots movement, you’ve answered. You’ve donated. You’ve knocked ondoors and made phone calls to voters in your free time. You’ve helped usregister Ohioans all across the state. You’ve talked to your friends andfamily about this historic election. It means more than you know. Now, here weare in November, with the election looming over us, only four days away – andwe have a new goal that we need your help to reach. We intend to raise $25,000by Election Day so we can fight back against the onslaught of Republicanspending trying to silence our voices and buy this election. Can you pitch in$5 to help us reach this goal? https://secure.actblue.com/donate/odp-email-241101-gotv?amount=5&refcode;=ODP_ATA_EM_FR_ThankYou_241101_T1_1 Inthese next four days, we’re not giving up on our unprecedented get out thevote push. We’re still on the ground, mobilizing voters, and getting Ohioansto the polls. Ohio’s House and Senate races will decide control of Congress,and these races will be won and lost by the closest of margins. So we’re notdone yet. This is the final stretch and we can’t afford to waste a singlesecond. If you’re able, please chip in anything you can afford to help usreach our Election Day fundraising goal so we can win at the ballot box onTuesday >> https://secure.actblue.com/donate/odp-email-241101-gotv?refcode=ODP_ATA_EM_FR_ThankYou_241101_T1_1 Thank you foryour constant support. name: Katrina Christiansen
body: One dollar. That’s the donation I am asking you to make before midnight. Peter– seriously, just $1. So I’mrelying on help from grassroots Democrats – not corporate donors and specialinterests – to fund my campaign in these last days. So please, Peter: Can you makea contribution of just $1 to ensure we have the resources to counter everyRepublican attack and reach voters before they head to the polls with ourcampaign's winning message? name: Scott Presler
subject: Election Update From Pennsylvania
body: Democrats will do ANYTHING to stop us from getting out the vote Friend, Idon't have much time but I needed to share this update about what is happeningon the ground in Pennsylvania. Democrats are trying to get me thrown inPRISON! The same Democrat machine that is relentlessly waging lawfare againstPresident Trump and the leaders of our America First movement is now goingafter my team and I. Why? Because they know that our efforts are moving theneedle towards a complete MAGA victory and they will do anything to try toslow us down. Thanks to the support of patriots like you Early Voting in PAwas through the roof for Republicans: For the first time ever, Republicansrequested and returned more mail-in ballots than Democrats. And make nomistake %recipient.first%, if we hold the line in Pennsylvania the so-called"Blue Wall" will come crumbling down, President Trump will return to the WhiteHouse, and we can finally get back to work saving our nation. But there isstill a lot of work that needs to be done in the final stretch before ElectionDay. We must ensure that our victory is TOO BIG TO RIG and we cannot allow theLeft to distract us from achieving our goal. STEP UP NOW - LET'S FINISH THIS!Right now, our team is deploying door knockers across the Commonwealth ofPennsylvania to make certain every Trump supporter that has not already votedbefore the Early Voting deadline shows up and casts their vote on ElectionDay. If you are able, please make a contribution so that we can fund theseefforts until we get over the finish line . $12 - SPONSOR A DOOR KNOCKER FOR 1HOUR $24 - SPONSOR A DOOR KNOCKER FOR 2 HOURS $48 - SPONSOR A DOOR KNOCKERFOR 4 HOURS Our team will not lose focus until every patriot in this crucialswing state that wants to take our country back and restore American greatnessbanks their vote. I am grateful for everyone who chooses to stand with us atthis pivotal moment. It is because of your support that I am confident we willsecure Pennsylvania, take back the White House, and MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!Yours Sincerely, Scott Presler Paid for by Early Vote Action PAC Unsubscribehere

name: Debbie Mucarsel-Powell
subject: Respectfully asking for two minutes of your time
body: Two minutes, friend. I'm respectfully asking for two minutes of your timebecause it will only take me a couple of minutes to explain the criticalmoment we're at in our race to defeat Rick Scott here in Florida. We're FOURDAYS out from the election, and I am up against my critical end-of-monthdeadline at midnight tomorrow. This comes just as Rick Scott dropped $10MILLION on ads, plus ANOTHER $3M of his own personal fortune, after newpolling showed me statistically tied with him. To pull ahead and win, I mustraise every dollar of this $4 million goal before time runs out. This is ourbest and only hope to defeat Trump puppet Rick Scott in Florida and save ourDemocratic Senate majority in the process — and we've only gotten to thispoint because grassroots supporters like you gave at critical moments likethis. So please, before my 11:59 p.m. deadline — will you rush a donation of$5 or more before midnight to defeat Rick Scott and defend our DemocraticSenate majority?https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2475-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 This goal means everything, friend. Rick Scottis using his massive fortune to outspend us on the airwaves, and Floridiansare already heading to the ballot box. Hitting this $4 million goal willensure we have the resources to amplify our own ads, fight Rick Scott'sattacks, and reach undecided voters as they cast their ballots. My two minutesare up, so let me conclude with this: I am so grateful for you, friend — forthis entire team donating an average of $30.95 at a time because you believein the movement we've built. name: Tammy Baldwin
subject: I’m used to being written off
body: I’m used to being written off, Peter. When I first ran for Congress inWisconsin, no one thought I could win — especially when an extremely popularchallenger jumped into the race. I remember huddling with one of my staffersat the time, and she said, “Well Tammy, maybe you want to rethink what you’redoing because it’s going to be tough.” I looked her right in the eye andasked, “Do you think I should wait my turn?” The next thing I said was this: Ibelieve that women have to run — especially when it’s hard — and not wait ourturn. We can’t wait until we get a tap on our shoulder or we’ll never getanywhere. I ended up winning that race and became the very first woman electedto the House of Representatives from Wisconsin. And it wouldn’t be the lasttime our team would make history. When I ran for U.S. Senate in 2012, anincredible team of grassroots supporters like you fought alongside me — evenas some people wrote us off. You helped me become the first woman elected tothe chamber from our state and the first openly gay Senator in our nation’shistory. In 2018, despite being a top target for national Republicans andenduring over a year of attacks, you stood with me again, and we won. Time andagain, grassroots supporters like you have helped us defy the odds. The battleto protect my seat this year will be no different, with this race being mytoughest election yet. Eric Hovde and his Republican allies have already spentmore than $51 million to buy this seat and recent polls are showing this racein a dead heat. Protecting this seat won’t be easy, but together, I know wecan defy the odds once again. [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82059?refcode=em20241101-8585&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amounts;=5%2C20%2C50%2C100%2C250%2C500%2C1000&t;=1001&akid;=8585%2E614464%2EdBu_u_]So Peter, I’m humbly asking: Will you split a donation between my reelectioncampaign and Lucas Kunce today to help us protect this battleground seat andthe Senate majority? If you've stored your info with ActBlue Express, we'llprocess your contribution instantly: [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82060?refcode=em20241101-8585&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=10&t;=1002&akid;=8585%2E614464%2EdBu_u_]Contribute $10 [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82060?refcode=em20241101-8585&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=25&t;=1003&akid;=8585%2E614464%2EdBu_u_]Contribute $25 [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82060?refcode=em20241101-8585&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=30&t;=1004&akid;=8585%2E614464%2EdBu_u_]Contribute $30 [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82060?refcode=em20241101-8585&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=50&t;=1005&akid;=8585%2E614464%2EdBu_u_]Contribute $50 [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82060?refcode=em20241101-8585&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=100&t;=1006&akid;=8585%2E614464%2EdBu_u_]Contribute $100 [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82060?refcode=em20241101-8585&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=250&t;=1007&akid;=8585%2E614464%2EdBu_u_]Contribute $250 [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82059?refcode=em20241101-8585&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amounts;=5%2C20%2C50%2C100%2C250%2C500%2C1000&t;=1008&akid;=8585%2E614464%2EdBu_u_]Give another amount Your support has made all the difference time and timeagain, and I can’t thank you enough for that. name: Tim Sheehy
subject: $309 per vote
body: Tim Sheehy for Montana Given the glut of outside spending on this race, it isnow costing our campaign $309 to reach a single registered voter. FellowConservative, If the most recent poll released over the weekend is to bebelieved, more than 23,000 voters in Montana have yet to decide whether theywill support me or my opponent, Democrat Jon Tester. With just four days leftin the race, we’re running out of time to reach these folks before they casttheir ballots. And that is not good news for us.In 2006, Jon Tester won hisfirst race by just 3,562 votes; trust me when I tell you that every votematters. With the Senate majority on the line, our need for further assistanceis immediate and as urgent as it gets. HELP ME REACH EVER LAST UNDECIDEDVOTER→ Given the glut of outside spending on this race, it is now costing ourcampaign $309 to reach a single registered voter.That means if we want toreach every last of Montana's 23,000+ undecided voters, we need to raise anadditional $7 million. When I tell you that every dollar counts, you know Igenuinely mean it. When I tell you that this race will come down to the lastvote, now you know I genuinely mean it. Please, can you help me get across thefinish line with a gift of $1, $5, $25, $75 or even $1,000 today. HELP MEREACH EVER LAST UNDECIDED VOTER→ For America's Future, Tim Sheehy Former NavySEAL Republican Candidate for U.S. Senate CHIP IN TODAY “ "I SERVED AS A NAVYSEAL, BUILT ONE OF THE LARGEST AERIAL FIREFIGHTING COMPANIES IN AMERICACREATING OVER 200 MONTANA JOBS, AND STARTED A VETERAN-LED CATTLE RANCHING ANDFEEDING OPERATION. WHETHER IT WAS IN WAR OR BUSINESS, I SEE PROBLEMS AND SOLVETHEM. AMERICA NEEDS CONSERVATIVE LEADERS WHO LOVE OUR COUNTRY. I'M RUNNING FORTHE U.S. SENATE BECAUSE OUR CAMPAIGN IS ABOUT SERVICE, DUTY, AND COUNTRY — NOTPOLITICS AS USUAL." Unsubscribe PAID FOR BY TIM SHEEHY FOR MONTANA TimSheehy is a former Navy SEAL. Use of his military rank, job titles, andphotographs in uniform does not imply endorsement by the Department of theNavy or the Department of Defense.

name: Rob Ortt
subject: Join me for a Veterans For Trump Rally!
body: Email from Ortt for State Senate I hope you can join us for a Trump Rally... Dear Supporter, This Monday, November 4th, join me with WWII Veteran Dr. John Long for a Veterans For Trump Rally as we come together to support President Donald Trump and make a final push for victory! (Invite Attached Below) Time: November 4th @ 5:30 PM Location: Potts Deli, 41 S Rossler Ave. Cheektowaga, NY Let’s get to work making sure our margin of victory is TOO BIG TO RIG! See you there, RSVP HERE Can't make it? Consider contributing to our campaign here: Support Here PAID FOR BY ROB ORTT FOR STATE SENATE Ortt for State Senate | PO Box 1279 | North Tonawanda, NY 14120 US Unsubscribe | Update Profile | Constant Contact Data Notice

name: Lt. Governor Sara Rodriguez
subject: It's never been more important to vote
body: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/srodriguez-email?refcode=20241101_em_fr_b1_SR_NGP[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/srodriguez-email?refcode=20241101_em_fr_b1_SR_NGP] Friend, it's Lt. Governor SaraRodriguez. I'm reaching out one last time before Election Day with one simplereminder: This is one of the most important elections of our lifetimes.Wisconsin is one of the most important swing states in the country. Our 10electoral votes are some of the most important in the country, and it'scrucial that we deliver them to Kamala Harris on Election Day. And at thestate level, we have a task that's just as important: flipping the statelegislature. The new, fairer maps for this cycle give everyone the chance towin, which makes this the first time in a long time that we can win a majoritythis November. When we win next Tuesday, it'll let Governor Evers and I focuson passing our agenda that truly serves the people of Wisconsin rather thanfighting back against Republican attempts to bully working-classWisconsinites. With just a few days left in this election cycle, it's moreimportant than ever to make your voice heard at the ballot box. Whether thatmeans voting early or voting on Election Day, the most important thing is thatyou vote. I'll be doing my part this weekend, knocking on as many doors as Ican with my team—can you chip in to help us cover the expenses for this lastbig GOTV push? [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/srodriguez-email?refcode=20241101_em_fr_b1_SR_NGP] CHIP IN[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/srodriguez-email?refcode=20241101_em_fr_b1_SR_NGP] In service, Lt. Gov Sara Rodriguez Lt.Gov. Sara Rodriguez, MSN, MPH, RN, was sworn in as Wisconsin’s 46th LieutenantGovernor on January 3, 2023. A working mom, wife, and proud Wisconsinite, Lt.Gov. Rodriguez was elected on November 8, 2022. Before her election, sheserved in the Wisconsin State Assembly, representing Assembly District 13,comprising a portion of Waukesha and Milwaukee Counties. While serving as astate representative, she worked on the Committees on Health, Insurance,Energy and Utilities, and Science, Technology and Broadband.https://secure.actblue.com/donate/srodriguez-email?refcode=20241101_em_fr_b1_SR_NGP[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/srodriguez-email?refcode=20241101_em_fr_b1_SR_NGP] Lt. Gov. Rodriguez is an experiencedhealthcare executive who has worked in various leadership roles for over 20years, including founding her own small business. Prior to serving in theWisconsin State Assembly, Lt. Gov. Rodriguez was the vice president ofPopulation Health and Integrated Care Management at one of the largesthealthcare systems in the Midwest. In this role, she provided strategicdirection to the teams that managed population health interventions for risk-based contracts and direct-to-employer products. Before running for office,Lt. Gov. Rodriguez built a career in public health and population healthmanagement. She held positions with public health departments at the local,state, and federal levels, including serving as an epidemic intelligenceservice officer with the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, thechronic disease director for the state of Colorado, a healthcare systemsconsultant, and a vice president at a Fortune 100 Company. Prefer to donatevia mail? Address a check to: Sara Rodriguez for Wisconsin PO Box 1404Brookfield, WI 53008 SUPPORT SARA RODRIGUEZ[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/srodriguez-email?refcode=20241101_em_fr_b1_SR_NGP] Paid for by Sara Rodriguez forWisconsin Sara Rodriguez for Wisconsin PO Box 1404 Brookfield, WI 53008-1404United States If you believe you received this message in error or wish to nolonger receive email from us, please unsubscribe:https://secure.ngpvan.com/p/bSK0S2TpB06fE82_CF0vSg2?unsubscribedata=6t%2BbifcHEWrIOkT1h8lzaXbV3cmc6C5UAWWl17FaQm3QGNrp56lFcPQH5PqUCm7hpBaFiOgW1QS2C4NcE%2BYLF8gjpcAs52C6LtFu%2F8LRdrvWgfHCORWruy62i8cfXSiz41o0E3SsmLItPYbU%2BdX%2BwyVILwi4FpcoJfT8TloBhmkSw2i7iuz14rZNKXE0P3wwx9HkGCKf6nuM1UBco2BdOIvXKEDxWqp7l6nwKipqjfnRbh%2Ft7fVPrBuJJ01cdGioLKrD%2BJXG4MnqaDgLV05MSPWlYs0PPUXdvSuXVixW0EPc5f2W6jBjZScHcaFIQ7wyxftJb1vtDiQEY6JP3YgbNAklVp55yk5ZV4MZUUchQmDns3tiChKPo3KW7tBqm8E58Ueeer%2FGBilmHE6V6eQ7KCMPbG2G909%2BLyl4yRnbof5n03Z9R%2BiBOdNP7iAOrUBv.

name: Ben Forstate, Deluzio HQ
subject: this is the last weekend before the election (and your last chance to make an impact)
body: https://chrisforpa.com/ [https://chrisforpa.com/] Hey Derek, it’sBen Forstate, Chris’ campaign manager. I know you’re probably about to headoffline for the weekend, so I’ll keep this quick: We need to raise $15,000this weekend to support our get out the vote efforts before Election Day. CanI count on you to pitch in and help us hit this final goal?[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/deluzioq42024email?refcode=email_110124_gotv1&amounts;=5,15,25,50,100,250]Donate →[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/deluzioq42024email?refcode=email_110124_gotv1&amounts;=5,15,25,50,100,250]If you have a little more time before logging off, let me explain the stakesof this race: National Republicans have made defeating Chris a top priority.They know that the path to winning the House runs right through PA-17, andthey think that this is a toss-up race they can flip. Only 4 House seats standbetween Republicans or Democrats taking back the House. So winning in this keybattleground race puts us on the best track to winning back the House. But weneed to get out Chris’s message and turn out voters before and on ElectionDay. Republicans are attacking Chris’s record, but they’re the ones with theagenda Western PA doesn’t want. Chris’s opponent supports an extreme,nationwide abortion ban, has rallied with election deniers, has voted to gutvoting rights, and wants to put Social Security and Medicare on the choppingblock. The American people don’t want this kind of lunacy, chaos, andextremism. That’s why we’ve got to do everything we can to keep this seat soChris can continue fighting to defend our freedoms. But if we’re going to beatthese extremists on Tuesday, we need to hit the ground running this weekend,and we need the money to make it happen. This is the last weekend before theelection – and your last chance to make a real impact in this race. Please,consider donating any amount you can to help us get out the vote in thesefinal few days →[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/deluzioq42024email?refcode=email_110124_gotv1&amounts;=5,15,25,50,100,250]If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donationwill go through immediately: Donate $5 →[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/deluzioq42024email?refcode=email_110124_gotv1&express;_lane=true&amounts;=5,15,25,50,100&amount;=5]Donate $25 →[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/deluzioq42024email?refcode=email_110124_gotv1&express;_lane=true&amounts;=5,15,25,50,100&amount;=25]Donate $50 →[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/deluzioq42024email?refcode=email_110124_gotv1&express;_lane=true&amounts;=5,15,25,50,100&amount;=50]Donate $100 →[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/deluzioq42024email?refcode=email_110124_gotv1&express;_lane=true&amounts;=5,15,25,50,100&amount;=100]Donate $250 →[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/deluzioq42024email?refcode=email_110124_gotv1&express;_lane=true&amounts;=5,15,25,50,100,250&amount;=250]Other →[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/deluzioq42024email?refcode=email_110124_gotv1&express;_lane=true&amounts;=5,15,25,50,100,250]We need one last push to get out the vote — let’s finish strong and protectPA-17. name: Jon Tester
subject: NEW poll in Montana’s Senate race
body: Peter—it’s Jon. I’m in the toughest race of my life to win Montana’s Senateseat, and a brand new poll has me tied against Tim Sheehy. I can feel thatthe momentum is on our side and we can't afford to waste a single second of itover these next four days. I need you now more than ever: Will you split adonation of $25 to help us finish these final days in the best possibleposition to win this race?After seeing this new poll, generous donors arematching every donation to this email dollar-for-dollar >> RUSH IN $25 Look,I’m no stranger to tough elections—I won my first Senate race by less than onepercentage point. But I’ve never run a race like this. Mitch McConnell ismaking it his #1 mission to defeat me. His big money buddies have poured inmillions of dollars to boost their handpicked candidate, and flood theairwaves with attacks against me—right as Montanans vote. But this new pollshows that if we put in the work these last four days, we can break the tieand defeat Tim Sheehy. My team says we raise about $25K from emails like thisone. I think we can do $60K right now—but I need your help to get there.Peter, will you rush a matched donation of $25 (becomes $50) before midnight?If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donationwill go through immediately: RUSH IN $25 RUSH IN $50 RUSH IN $100 RUSH IN$250 RUSH IN $500 OTHER AMOUNT Thank you, Jon DONATE Paid for by DefeatBoebert PAC This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com . name: Rep. Karen Bennett, GHDC Chair
subject: Have you made your voting plan yet? 🗳️
body: Hi Peter, Have you made your voting plan yet? Election Day is this Tuesday,November 5th – just 4 days away! If you’re voting by mail, please send in yourballot as soon as possible. For in-person voting, check your polling locationfor early voting or Election Day on Tuesday. FIND YOUR POLLING PLACE[https://mvp.sos.ga.gov/s/] Don’t wait until the last minute to make a plan tomake your voice heard! In these final 4 days until Election Day , we'rechanneling every resource into knocking on doors, making calls, sending texts,and reaching undecided voters—the ones who can cast the decisive ballots tobring more Democrats into our State House this January. We need your help toreach our fundraising goal and make this final push possible – can you givetoday? DONATE NOW [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ga-nov24-finalcountdown?refcode2=54d0a445-7798-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b] We’recounting on your support! Every dollar donated makes a difference. Gratefully,Rep. name: Dan Osborn
subject: the U.S. Senate is just another country club
body: Click here to stop receiving emails about Dan Osborn's campaign in Nebraskafrom us. [https://secure.ngpvan.com/uB3EyayArUyKTBgRW_x--A2]https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101mid-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&refcode2;=98410eeb-7698-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&recurring;=true[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101mid-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&refcode2;=98410eeb-7698-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&recurring;=true]Heythere, The U.S. Senate is a country club. It’s full of millionaires, formerbusiness execs, lawyers with Ivy League degrees, and trust fund kids born withso many silver spoons in their mouths that they have no idea the reality forworking-class people like me. If I defeat my opponent Republican Senator DebFischer in November, I will be the poorest member of the U.S. Senate. I don’tcome from money, and I’m not rich. I’m a steamfitter and mechanic who works 50and 60 hour weeks to give my kids a better life. I will be the only senatorwithout a college degree. After my wife and I found out we were expecting ababy, I had to drop out and kill my dream of hanging a diploma on the wallbecause my family needed health insurance, diapers, and food on the table. Iwill be the only senator who is a blue-collar, card-carrying, union member.When Kellogg’s tried to cut our benefits and workers’ pay, we risked it all,went on strike, and walked the picket line for 11 weeks through the bittercold Nebraska winter. We won and saved hundreds of good-paying jobs – before Iwas fired for being the union president who led the strike. There is no onewho represents working-class people like me in the U.S. Senate. Which is whythis is such big news: Five brand-new polls show I am narrowly LEADING myopponent Republican Senator Deb Fischer. And FiveThirtyEight now says this isthe CLOSEST Senate race in the entire country! I’ve taken on a big corporationbefore and won, and now I’m going to defeat one of the most corporate senators– my opponent Republican Deb Fischer – and win this Senate seat. But I needyour help to do it. We’ve set a goal of raising another $200,000 before ournext fundraising deadline at midnight tonight, but I’m not taking money fromcorporate PACs like my opponent. If I’m going to defeat Republican Deb Fischerand win this Senate seat, I need grassroots donors like you to give right now:I have nowhere else to turn. Please, will you chip in $5 or more right now –every dollar you can afford before our fundraising deadline – to help medefeat Republican Deb Fischer and win this Senate seat?[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101mid-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&refcode2;=98410eeb-7698-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&recurring;=true]Please use the links in this email to start a monthly donation throughActBlue: DONATE $10[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101mid-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&refcode2;=98410eeb-7698-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $25[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101mid-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&refcode2;=98410eeb-7698-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $35[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101mid-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&refcode2;=98410eeb-7698-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $50[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101mid-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&refcode2;=98410eeb-7698-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $100[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101mid-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&refcode2;=98410eeb-7698-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]Other Amount[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101mid-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&refcode2;=98410eeb-7698-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&recurring;=true]I’m ready to be the 51st vote in the Senate to take on the billionaires andcorporations, fight for working-class people, and expand workers’ rights – butI can’t do it without you. I know the value of a dollar, so I am grateful forany amount you can afford to give. It genuinely means a lot to me. text:
The issue of out-of-state contractors being awarded contracts for local infrastructure projects is a common concern among voters and candidates alike. It raises questions about the efficient use of taxpayer funds, support for local economies, and the environmental impact of increased traffic during construction. To address these concerns, I would suggest the following steps:
1. **Transparency in Bidding Process**: Ensure that the bidding process for infrastructure projects is transparent. This includes publishing the criteria used for evaluating bids and the reasons why a particular bid was selected.
2. **Local Preference Policies**: Implement policies that give preference to local contractors, provided they meet the required qualifications and can compete on cost and quality with out-of-state contractors.
3. **Community Impact Assessments**: Conduct thorough assessments of the community impact before awarding contracts. This includes evaluating the economic benefits to the local community, potential traffic disruptions, and environmental considerations.
4. **Public Engagement**: Engage with the public throughout the project lifecycle. Inform residents about why a particular contractor was chosen, the expected benefits of the project, and any anticipated disruptions.
5. **Continuous Improvement**: Regularly review and update procurement policies to ensure they are effective and responsive to community needs and concerns.
By taking these steps, we can work towards a more efficient, transparent, and community-focused approach to infrastructure development that aligns with the interests of voters.

subject: Jim Himes Loves Honey - But Connecticut Contractors Need the Money
body: View this post on the web at https://drmichaelgoldstein4ct.substack.com/p/jim-himes-loves-honey-but-connecticut My Fellow Voters, On the campaign trail, wehave driven all over the district. As you can imagine, we have been stuck in alot of traffic. It is an issue we have One thing we noticed on this campaignwas the license plates on the construction companies on I-95 and the Merritttend to be New York. Thanks for reading Michael’s Substack! Subscribe for freeto receive new posts and support my work. Look at the Groundbreaking last weekfor I-95 Photo- Tyler Fedor Source [ http://Tyler Fedor/The Stamford Advocate] Yonkers Contracting is based in New York. As an advocate for you, I reachedout to the press - so far, no response from the media. We are glad there aresome infrastructure improvements and most of the funds are federal but shouldwe also look to use Connecticut companies and keep more of the money in ourstate. After all they are federal tax dollars from CT residents as Connecticutonly gets back 70 cents of every federal dollar spent. A vote for me is a votefor transparency. We Need Your Support to get our final messages out for thecampaign that has been grassroots. Please support if you can. Please alsoamplify our messages Website www.goldsteinforcongress.com - Substack:https://drmichaelgoldstein4ct.substack.com/ Instagram:https://www.instagram.com/drmichaelgoldstein/ X: https://x.com/DrMGoldsteinFacebook https://www.facebook.com/goldsteinforcongress/ Dr. Michael Goldstein(ROW 3B) - Early Voting this weekend 10-6 www.goldsteinforcongress.com [http://www.goldsteinforcongress.com/ ] Paid for by Goldstein for Congress Thisis the Inquiry Sent below: Dear Editors and Investigative Journalists ofConnecticut's Major News & Media Outlets and Other Independent News ChannelOutlets: The Doctor Michael Goldstein for Congress Campaign for the 4thCongressional District has received numerous inquiries and concerns aboutYonkers Contracting as the Primary Contractor for most CT DOT projectsthroughout Fairfield County and other parts of the state. We see these truckseverywhere every night along the campaign trail when the roads are beingworked on for improvements. The concerns they raise are seeing New YorkLicense plates and why these are not Connecticut trucks. Have you looked into:How are these contracts awarded? If an out-of-state contractor is hired, willit use Connecticut Union Construction workers and other ancillary Connecticutresidents to participate in the construction or are all these workers New Yorkas well? If an out-of-state contractor is hired, will it use local suppliersof various materials or are all these suppliers New York as well? Whether allcontracts are awarded to the lowest bidder? Are local contractors consideredif their bid is slightly higher? How is a contractor rewarded or penalized byits previous project for change order usage as the winners always seem to bethe same? The percentage of payrolls to Connecticut residents (if any)? Thebenefit to local communities and economies in Connecticut if a localcontractor is awarded the contract? The benefits of contractor profits beingre-invested into the local economy rather than exporting profits outside of CTfor the out-of-state contractor and its out-of-state suppliers? AdditionalFees such as fuel surcharges and other distance based issues on logistics? AsClimate Change and Health Hazards associated with slow-moving traffic are alsomajor concerns, are the following also included in the calculation: Theenvironmental impact of greenhouse gas based on travel distance of workers andequipment out of state to the project site? The additional congestion of theworkforce commuting to the construction site and how it will disrupt trafficfor commuters? We have been concerned about the I-95 traffic and thechallenges to the Fairfield County corridor and now a project is starting. Wesaw the Yonkers Contracting banner and also wondered why there are noConnecticut Companies that win these bids. While most of the highway funds arefrom the Federal Government, it is still Connecticut taxpayer funds as CT hastraditionally received only 70 cents back on each federal dollar. As acandidate for Congress in Connecticut and campaigning on improving theFairfield County corridor, it is not just about improving the roads, buthaving a lasting impact on the local economies of Fairfield County andsurrounding counties that keep federally spent dollars in Connecticut. SomeLinks we have briefly assembled as this is really investigative reporting:https://www.thehour.com/news/article/i-95-delays-norwalk-westport-ctdot-bridge-replace-18404086.php [https://www.thehour.com/news/article/i-95-delays-norwalk-westport-ctdot-bridge-replace-18404086.php ]https://www.thehour.com/news/article/norwalk-i-95-fairfield-avenue-bridge-fire-crash-19525562.php [https://www.thehour.com/news/article/norwalk-i-95-fairfield-avenue-bridge-fire-crash-19525562.php ] https://www.yonkerscontractingco.com/stamford-parking [ https://www.yonkerscontractingco.com/stamford-parking ]https://newyork.news12.com/sick-of-backups-on-i-95-new-project-promises-relief[ https://newyork.news12.com/sick-of-backups-on-i-95-new-project-promises-relief ] https://www.ctinsider.com/projects/2024/news/ct-norwalk-bridge-i95-demolition/ [ https://www.ctinsider.com/projects/2024/news/ct-norwalk-bridge-i95-demolition/ ] The voters want to know why tax dollars leavefor out-of-state contractors when they know there are contractors in the State(not necessarily in the Congressional District) to do the work. We wouldappreciate your prompt attention to this matter as this is a major concern forour Voters. Traffic, Infrastructure, Climate Change and Health are on theBallot and the voter should be informed. Connecticut has also some of thehighest costs per mile for road repair and construction and our constituentsare concerned about inefficient use of taxpayer funds at the state and locallevel as poor spending hurts each resident in the pocketbook. We arethoroughly concerned about these issues. Sincerely, Dr. Michael T. GoldsteinCandidate for Congress Please reply here or info@goldsteinforcongress.com [mailto:info@goldsteinforcongress.com ] Our campaign main line for inquiries at203-350-9181 Thanks for reading Michael’s Substack! Subscribe for free toreceive new posts and support my work. Unsubscribehttps://substack..NXKao7pvTOCyJy9UZ67wlMLXAzrx4bU5BGeSidOaeUA?

name: Steve Daines
subject: Seven Seats
body: Steve Daines for Senate The fate of the Senate majority and White House willcome down to these seven races. Fellow American, the Senate majority will comedown to just 7 races: Montana Ohio Michigan Nevada Pennsylvania WisconsinArizona Here's the bad news, Fellow American. Our candidates are beingoutraised by millions in these states. TAKE BACK THE SENATE ⇒ HELP 7 RACESBut this isn't just about the Senate. These states will also be CRITICAL forPresident Trump to win back the White House. President Trump is polling neck-and-neck with Kamala Harris in battleground states. If our Senate races aresuccessful, it will help Donald Trump DEFEAT Kamala Harris where it mattersmost. I know what we're up against, Fellow American. Democrats are raising andspending millions more than us, but we have a better message. Kamala Harrishas done NOTHING to secure our border as Vice President. Donald Trump and aRepublican Senate will BUILD THE WALL. Joe Biden and Kamala Harris wereresponsible for our disastrous Afghanistan withdrawal.Republican candidateslike Tim Sheehy, Sam Brown, and Dave McCormick actually have SERVED overseas.Kamala Harris and Senate Democrats want to PACK our courts with liberaljudges. As President, Donald Trump and a Republican Senate confirmed moreconservative judges and Justices than ANY OTHER PRESIDENT IN HISTORY. It'sclear that we need a Republican White House and Senate, but we also need yourhelp to make that a reality. The map is on our side, but the financials arenot. Will you make a split donation to help President Trump, Tim Sheehy (MT),Bernie Moreno (OH), Mike Rogers (MI), Sam Brown (NV), Dave McCormick (PA),Eric Hovde (WI), and Kari Lake (AZ)? There's too much at stake to sit on thesideline with 3 days left. Thank you, Steve Daines TAKE BACK THE SENATE ⇒HELP 7 RACES Steve Daines is a fifth-generation Montanan, life-long sportsmanand father of four serving the people of Montana as their Senator. Steve iscommitted to always putting Montana first as he works to bring real change toWashington and fights for more jobs, less government and common sensesolutions to get our country back on track.Chip in $10 or more to help Stevetoday! <> Senator Steve Daines Paid for by Steve Daines for MontanaUnsubscribe

name: Kevin Lincoln
subject: Worried about you
body: Kevin Lincoln for Congress We can take back the White House and the Senate,but if we lose the House – which we only hold by a handful of seats – we can’tget anything done. I’m worried you’re sleeping on this, Peter. Democrats havebeen leading in the Generic Congressional Ballot for three months now, meaningmore Americans would rather send a Democrat to represent them in Congress thana Republican. We can take back the White House and the Senate, but if we losethe House – which we only hold by a handful of seats –we can’t get anythingdone. Our borders won’t be secured, inflation won’t go down, communities won’tget safer, and government overreach won’t be reeled in. That’s why yoursupport for Republican victories in target battleground seats is so critical.We can’t miss out on real chances to flip vulnerable Democrat-held seats likethis one in CA-9. SEND A MARINE TO CONGRESS ➞ I’m fighting tooth and naildown the home stretch, and I need your help to close the deal. As a MarineCorps veteran, former pastor, and current Mayor, I’m ready to bring serviceand leadership to Congress to get our country back on track. But I need yourhelp. Don’t sleep on this. Flip this seat, protect our Republican HouseMajority, and secure the future of our country by chipping in to support mycampaign today. For America, Kevin Lincoln Veteran, USMC SEND A MARINE TOCONGRESS ➞ Meet Kevin Lincoln My name is Kevin Lincoln, and my story, is theValley’s story. I am a 3rd generation Stocktonian, raising a 4th generation inthe city I love. I’m the grandson of Mexican immigrants, and my stepfather isan Army veteran. Like many Stocktonians, my family has overcome economicsetbacks. My own father struggled to survive on these streets, and was at onetime, homeless. But I never let adversity define me. I joined the Marines andserved in the White House Military Office, assigned to Marine One. I graduatedcollege while working full-time and raising a family. I’ve worked in corporateAmerica and served our community as a pastor, and as a non-profit leader. I’mblessed with a beautiful wife, Bonnie, and two amazing children. I’ve lived alife of service, but the greatest honor of my life has been giving back to mycommunity, through serving as Mayor of my hometown, Stockton. SEND A MARINE TOCONGRESS ➞ Like, Follow, and Subscribe! Kevin Lincoln is a former member ofthe U.S. Marine Corps. Use of his military rank, job titles, and photographsin uniform does not imply endorsement by the Marine Corps or the Department ofDefense. PAID FOR BY KEVIN LINCOLN FOR CONGRESS We'd hate to see you go but ifyou'd like to unsubscribe, click here.

name: Tim Sheehy
subject: You need to know what happened
body: Tim Sheehy for Montana Honestly, the money gap is so large that there is adistinct possibility that my opponent will block us on the airwaves. We'regoing dark, Peter - And it couldn’t come at a worse time. A new poll has meTIED with my opponent less than a week out from Election Day. If you don’talready know, here’s what happened. PLEASE LET ME EXPLAIN → “ "I SERVED AS ANAVY SEAL, BUILT ONE OF THE LARGEST AERIAL FIREFIGHTING COMPANIES IN AMERICACREATING OVER 200 MONTANA JOBS, AND STARTED A VETERAN-LED CATTLE RANCHING ANDFEEDING OPERATION. WHETHER IT WAS IN WAR OR BUSINESS, I SEE PROBLEMS AND SOLVETHEM. AMERICA NEEDS CONSERVATIVE LEADERS WHO LOVE OUR COUNTRY. I'M RUNNING FORTHE U.S. SENATE BECAUSE OUR CAMPAIGN IS ABOUT SERVICE, DUTY, AND COUNTRY — NOTPOLITICS AS USUAL." Unsubscribe PAID FOR BY TIM SHEEHY FOR MONTANA TimSheehy is a former Navy SEAL. Use of his military rank, job titles, andphotographs in uniform does not imply endorsement by the Department of theNavy or the Department of Defense.

name: Wesley Bell for Congress
subject: Are you prepared…?
body: Peter, Election Day is almost here, and now is the time to make sure yourvoice is heard on November 5! Your vote is more than just a ballot. It’s yourchance to stand up for common-sense leadership and keep pushing Missouri, andour nation, forward. Whether you’ve already made a plan to vote or you’restill figuring out the details, we want to make sure you have everything youneed to cast your ballot. Find your nearest polling place here:https://www.vote.org/polling-place-locator/ Peter, the stakes this yearcouldn’t be higher. More than ever before, we need everyone to show that theybelieve in a future where everyone has a seat at the table. From the House ofRepresentatives to the Senate and the White House – the time to choose who youwant fighting for you and your loved ones is almost here, and none of us canafford to sit this one out. Let’s get this done, Missouri. Team Bell P.S.We’re only three days away from Election Day.
