name: Ritchie Torres
subject: I lived next to one of Donald Trump's golf courses
body: Peter, I grew up across the street from one of Donald Trump's golf courses inNew York. This one, in fact: ↘↘https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_torres_q42024_df?amount=3[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_torres_q42024_df?amount=3]Yes, really.But it was not the way I think you're picturing it in your mind — let meexplain. I didn't live in a skyrise apartment or a mansion with luxuries at myfingertips. I grew up in the Throggs Neck Houses, a crumbling public housingproject among vermin, lead, and mold, across from Trump's Golf Course in TheBronx. https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_torres_q42024_df?amount=3[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_torres_q42024_df?amount=3]My mom was asingle mom, working multiple jobs to keep food on the table. I'm so gratefulfor how much she sacrificed to provide for our family. Living across fromTrump's Golf Course, I had to see a reminder every day of how easily and oftenour government supports and enables the ultra-wealthy at the expense ofworking families. You see, the New York City government shoveled over $100million in government aid to develop this golf course with Donald Trump andthe corrupt Trump Organization. They did this while New York families likemine lived in hunger and poverty across the street. But, I always try to lookat the positives — growing up smelling the stench of Donald Trump (even beforehe became president) has led me to where I am today: Fighting in Congress forjustice for real working families. When I work on legislation, I always thinkabout the families who are struggling just like mine did. I lived thatexperience — it is not abstract to me. And I'll never forget it. I hope youfeel like you have a better sense of who I am and what my values are. I swearthat I'm fighting for those values every day in Congress. Right now, theshadow of Trump and his MAGA cult looms large. They're determined to strip ourright to vote, give tax breaks to people like Trump, and put special interestsahead of working families – and they’re raising millions to pull it off. Butwe have something they don’t, Peter: A powerful grassroots movement made up ofworking people, not faceless corporations. Can I count on you to join ourcoalition today by chipping in $3 toward our $10,000 election goal? Ifthousands of people like you each chip in what they can afford, I know we cantake on their dark money and reclaim our House Majority. »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_torres_q42024_df?amount=3] If you'vesaved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will gothrough immediately: CONTRIBUTE $3 »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_torres_q42024_df?amount=3&express;_lane=true]CONTRIBUTE $7 »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_torres_q42024_df?amount=7&express;_lane=true]Or a custom donation »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_torres_q42024_df?amount=10&amounts;=3,7,10]Thank you, Ritchie ---------------------------------------- Paid for by TorresFor Congress PO Box 580303, Bronx, NY 10458 www.torres.nyc Ritchie Torresrepresents the future of the Democratic Party. Raised by a single mother inpublic housing, Ritchie personally understands the hardships that workingfamilies endure. At age 25, Ritchie made history as the youngest electedofficial to serve on the New York City Council. He fought tirelessly for theworking families of The Bronx, and now, he's fighting for those families andfor progressive values in Congress. He is the first openly gay Afro Latinoever elected to Congress. Ritchie is a champion for progressive policies tofight poverty and to improve the lives of families just like the one he wasraised in. Click here to receive fewer emails:https://secure.ngpvan.com/wWSqTnXRfEul9oH2NSObtA2 Click here to unsubscribe:https://go.torres.nyc/p/laK8o_Kc50iR9tBbFwhZxw2?unsubscribedata=I9ckwtBOOcTddP3WoEXTXjBsRH77iIi6AdSKHzBjPiX2c6wTbW91mn7AZAX8y6ah%2BEXKC6PPNmGipIr%2F6cQRnCZHg2Mrm6VSVOC9AZx%2F5zXdMETKF8D7r8NqTU4Dn57Sgz5z6pB65jESlaJFiBvpIqucyzRjouzvPjEzi2sZnsqpqBABJn5c14Bq7VSak2AO8Ts4uu4FlT87MyU99HFX3ejm7r5U4lfujNKn3DKhyZYRw%2FbyKSDxtnHK29JbAtsg3jcj%2FUPML1XxFdyB2gqH4oSBjbb4wnyzrMPSE4kWmtDHEFSimWTGwJKNcnfcKLxZmAvXfiQ7Wv%2FLdXs3DBJi3wOug2J8bQ8ipqoOVTIRwcaAUaxmdC%2F%2FZ5VGPCPBChJlD1yniza5cz0NotRa87lU4SobkrK8tGQ0tboc13qjNg%2FwayiQ7OxpcgqTFV%2FHq0Y%2F.

name: Debbie Mucarsel-Powell
subject: the good, the bad, and the ugly
body: Hey, friend — I have some good and not-so-good news to share. Thanks to thisgrassroots team, we've been running ads across Florida in English and Spanish— and based on the numbers shared in our team meeting this morning, they areworking. The first week they aired, I shot up 3 points in the polls. Now, I'mLESS THAN 2 POINTS AWAY from taking Rick Scott's dwindling lead altogether.But actually clinching the lead means not only keeping my ads on the air butalso launching new ones — and based on the metrics shown in that same meeting,our fundraising numbers just hit a 30-day low: Without your help to close the52% gap on my LAST $4 million goal and keep funding my ads until Election Day,we risk losing all the momentum we've gained so far. Will you please give $5now to keep me on track to flip Florida blue?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2481-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 With just 72 hours until voters head to theballot box — amid reports that Rick Scott dumped another $10.5 MILLION tofurther blanket the airwaves with his own ads — this slowdown couldn't havecome at a worse time: * If grassroots donations stay on a downward trend, Iwon't have the funds to keep the ads we're airing on TV. * If I can't affordto keep my ads in front of Florida voters, my filthy-rich opponent will easilybuy up all the slots we'd be leaving on the table. * If Scott drowns out ourmessage with ads smearing me in this last leg of the race, there's no chancewe'll make a comeback in time for Election Day. That is, friend, unless I cancount on your help to stop the bleeding and meet my final $4 million goal. Inever would've entered striking distance of Rick Scott without your help, andI won't be able to overtake him in these final hours without you. Please,friend, will you rush $5, $25, or anything you can spare now to keep mecompetitive in the race to retire Rick and flip this Senate seat blue?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2481-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Thank you for everything, Debbie -------- Thisemail was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Our Rev Organizing Team
subject: Make calls into PA, MI, and WI
body: ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ [ stdin# ][IMG] Peter Willis — today, tomorrow, and Monday — that’s it. We have three days left to defeat Trump and we need to make as many calls into the swing states as humanly possible. This is an all hands on deck moment — [ https://act.ourrevolution.com/go/20424?t=1021&akid;=7176%2E5885482%2E3BGaqp ]click here to join one of our swing state phone banks in this final push. If you aren’t able to make calls with our team, [ https://act.ourrevolution.com/go/20425?t=1022&akid;=7176%2E5885482%2E3BGaqp ]please consider chipping in a donation to power our call and text operation — every dollar helps! [ https://act.ourrevolution.com/go/20424?t=1023&akid;=7176%2E5885482%2E3BGaqp ][IMG] We’re having conversations with voters in Pennsylvania, Michigan, Wisconsin, and the 4 other swing states. And those conversations are working — connecting with working class progressives who are on the fence and reminding them that Trump opposes raising the minimum wage, is anti-union, and gives tax breaks to the wealthy while demonizing our communities. We need to have as many of these conversations as we can because every single vote will count in the 7 swing states, especially across the blue wall states that Harris needs to win. [ https://act.ourrevolution.com/go/20358?source=email-20241102&t;=1024&akid;=7176%2E5885482%2E3BGaqp ]Can you sign up for one of our swing state phone banks today, tomorrow, and Monday so that we have the voter outreach to defeat Trump? [ https://act.ourrevolution.com/go/20358?source=email-20241102&t;=1025&akid;=7176%2E5885482%2E3BGaqp ]SIGN UP TO PHONE BANK [ https://act.ourrevolution.com/go/20358?source=email-20241102&t;=1026&akid;=7176%2E5885482%2E3BGaqp ]Sign up to phone bank today, Saturday 11/2, at 1pm ET [ https://act.ourrevolution.com/go/20358?source=email-20241102&t;=1027&akid;=7176%2E5885482%2E3BGaqp ]Sign up to phone bank tomorrow, Sunday 11/3, 1 - 4pm ET [ https://act.ourrevolution.com/go/20358?source=email-20241102&t;=1028&akid;=7176%2E5885482%2E3BGaqp ]Sign up to phone bank on Monday 11/4, 5:30 - 8:30pm ET [ https://act.ourrevolution.com/go/20424?t=1029&akid;=7176%2E5885482%2E3BGaqp ][IMG] Every person that signs up will help us hit our goal of making FIVE MILLION voter contacts before polls close on Election Day. [ https://act.ourrevolution.com/go/20425?t=1030&akid;=7176%2E5885482%2E3BGaqp ]If you can’t sign up, you can still help by chipping in to our Swing State Fund - this is a grassroots effort! When we organize, we win. text: Michael Bennet here. I’d like to share a message with you from Angus King, a critical partner of mine in the U.S. Senate. We can’t afford to lose his thoughtful, compassionate, bipartisan approach to policymaking. He’s running for reelection in Maine and I’d like to ask you to support him. Here's how you can contribute: [Donation Link]
name: Angus King
subject: Long days and long nights
body: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/bennet-aking?refcode=X_110224_BennetKing_act [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/bennet-aking?refcode=X_110224_BennetKing_act] Friend, Michael Bennet here. I’d like to share a message with you from a truly unique man I have the honor of serving with in the U.S. Senate: Angus King. Angus is a critical partner of mine in the U.S. Senate, and we can’t afford to lose his thoughtful, compassionate, bipartisan approach to policy making. He’s running for reelection in Maine and I’d like to ask you to support his campaign by splitting a $20 contribution between us. There’s just too much on the line — from reproductive rights to access to the ballot box — to risk losing Angus and letting Republicans take back the Senate majority. Can you chip in today? [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/bennet-aking?refcode=X_110224_BennetKing_act] - Michael - - - - - Forwarded Message - - - - https://secure.actblue.com/donate/bennet-aking?refcode=X_110224_BennetKing_act [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/bennet-aking?refcode=X_110224_BennetKing_act] As of today, there are only three days until Election Day. And as you might know, I am up for reelection. With time running out and the future of our democracy on the line I could really use your support. Can you donate any amount right now to be split between my campaign and my friend Michael Bennet so that we can keep delivering for the American people? [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/bennet-aking?refcode=X_110224_BennetKing_act] DONATE NOW [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/bennet-aking?refcode=X_110224_BennetKing_act] Here in the Senate, there are often long days and late nights. It’s not always glamorous, but I wouldn’t change it for the world – it’s the job you hired me to do. From helping address the cost of living to speaking on the Senate floor in defense of women’s rights, this work is incredibly rewarding. I can’t wait to keep fighting for you and your communities in the Senate if you give me the opportunity. But team, I need your support – large or small, it doesn’t matter – if I’m going to win my re-election campaign in November. Can you make a donation large or small to be split between myself and Michael Bennet right now? With the clock ticking, I promise every single dollar counts. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/bennet-aking?refcode=X_110224_BennetKing_act] DONATE $5 [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/bennet-aking?refcode=X_110224_BennetKing_act&amount;=5] DONATE $10 [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/bennet-aking?refcode=X_110224_BennetKing_act&amount;=10] DONATE $20 [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/bennet-aking?refcode=X_110224_BennetKing_act&amount;=20] DONATE $50 [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/bennet-aking?refcode=X_110224_BennetKing_act&amount;=50] DONATE $100 [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/bennet-aking?refcode=X_110224_BennetKing_act&amount;=100] DONATE OTHER [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/bennet-aking?refcode=X_110224_BennetKing_act] Politics are more divisive than ever. Partisan bickering and extremism have become the new normal. But I truly think that we Americans agree on far more than we disagree on, and we should find common-sense solutions that work for everyone. Every day I go to work in the Senate, I aim to rise above that partisanship to fight for the solutions that benefit all Americans. Are you with me? —Angus Bennet for Colorado PO Box 3078 Denver, CO 80201 United States WWW.MICHAELBENNET.COM [https://michaelbennet.com/?emci=db8b2fe5-53fb-ed11-907c-00224832eb73&emdi;=ea000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001&ceid;=1295540] | INFO@MICHAELBENNET.COM [info@michaelbennet.com] | PRIVACY POLICY [https://michaelbennet.com/privacy-policy/?emci=db8b2fe5-53fb-ed11-907c-00224832eb73&emdi;=ea000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001&ceid;=1295540] PAID FOR BY BENNET FOR COLORADO CLICK HERE TO RECEIVE FEWER EMAILS FROM OUR CAMPAIGN [https://secure.michaelbennet.com/a/mfb-em-210211-fe?emci=db8b2fe5-53fb-ed11-907c-00224832eb73&emdi;=ea000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001&ceid;=1295540] By clicking the links above, you certify that you are responsible for paying all charges incurred in using the debit or credit card to be charged, and that your personal funds will be the true source of the contribution. This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. If you wish to no longer receive these messages, please unsubscribe: https://secure.michaelbennet.com/p/eM96_n8vkEqD4sB1LzVS-w2?unsubscribedata=yPqeEGSmuZFgrmCiXQWdXbYbmYryxr6wpNsPztqund%2BfGmBK2eAh%2F7jAKwuz1tIJmC1eHGDfplbw21zeUubs4BVRFruoYdjQ6EkB5ZOeMRoMMRw4SX7OSlESurAMDG5Lak%2B%2FQNaWG%2FD2zHYvPuXOB2Yx0BtH44ujRp9S1xygcgdKgt3PR83o6WzYoYBJiLWFDXe97hUSrdZZ2raaQZbMacQqlCaOeyQSu7h%2BJFrRSjHCxsrJjbFcPU%2F2DcSHvN3x6nOqa2TeAr8SFFEgedbvz6Pd%2By1hjou%2BR29riSxF9Gz%2F6HKggxxLswPUxVvkvZP%2BamhCApIw01BCjXxXeEbYqwMXppkkKlNG3Vo%2BrwHbL1gX%2FsAo5Z%2Fmu0Cre1VXSqbyHgg9GgyRawenB40TTYIg7pHdIlXIp3o6hAuJ8BnmOKg%3D .

subject: This race is about putting people in charge of their own lives.
body: [1]Lucas Kunce for U.S. Senate [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/83396?refcode=em20241102-8607&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amounts;=5%2C20%2C50%2C100%2C250%2C500%2C1000&t;=1001&akid;=8607%2E614464%2ErabJvc]Screengrab from a Lucas Kunce X post. [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/83396?refcode=em20241102-8607&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amounts;=5%2C20%2C50%2C100%2C250%2C500%2C1000&t;=1002&akid;=8607%2E614464%2ErabJvc]DEFEAT JOSH HAWLEY If this week’s debate showed us anything, it’s that LucasKunce is the only candidate Missourians can trust to protect theirreproductive freedoms. Josh Hawley has the WORST record on everything fromabortion to birth control and IVF of ANY member of the U.S. Senate. Hepioneered the legal arguments that were used to shut down IVF clinics inAlabama earlier this year — and he even voted against the Right to IVF Act asrecently as last month. This is our opportunity to elect a real warrior forMissouri families to this U.S. Senate seat — someone who will vote to codifyRoe v. Wade, restore our freedoms, and put everyday people in charge of theirown bodies and lives. But we need your help to keep reaching voters with thismessage before it’s too late. That’s why we’re coming directly to you, Peter:[https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/83396?refcode=em20241102-8607&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amounts;=5%2C20%2C50%2C100%2C250%2C500%2C1000&t;=1003&akid;=8607%2E614464%2ErabJvc]Can we count on you to rush a donation of $10 or whatever you can today?Election Day is ONLY 3 DAYS away, so we’re running out of time to communicatethis message to Missourians before they head to the ballot box. If you'vestored your info with ActBlue Express, we'll process your contributioninstantly: [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/83397?refcode=em20241102-8607&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=10&t;=1004&akid;=8607%2E614464%2ErabJvc]Contribute $10 [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/83397?refcode=em20241102-8607&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=25&t;=1005&akid;=8607%2E614464%2ErabJvc]Contribute $25 [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/83397?refcode=em20241102-8607&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=30&t;=1006&akid;=8607%2E614464%2ErabJvc]Contribute $30 [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/83397?refcode=em20241102-8607&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=50&t;=1007&akid;=8607%2E614464%2ErabJvc]Contribute $50 [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/83397?refcode=em20241102-8607&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=100&t;=1008&akid;=8607%2E614464%2ErabJvc]Contribute $100 [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/83397?refcode=em20241102-8607&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=250&t;=1009&akid;=8607%2E614464%2ErabJvc]Contribute $250 [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/83396?refcode=em20241102-8607&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amounts;=5%2C20%2C50%2C100%2C250%2C500%2C1000&t;=1010&akid;=8607%2E614464%2ErabJvc]Give another amount It's now or never, Peter, and we are counting onsupporters like you to help us cross the finish line. name: Pete Maysmith, LCV Victory Fund
subject: GET OUT THE VOTE: LAST DAY TO PITCH IN
body: To view this mail in a browser, copyhttps://links.messages.lcv.org/servlet/MailView?ms=MTE3MTM2MTgS1&r;=NjA3MDU0MTAzNTc3S0&j;=MjEwMDAyNjY5MQS2&mt;=1&rt;=0into your browser. Peter — this is it. The election is on Tuesday, and ourfield teams are out knocking on doors right now to help Kamala Harris beatDonald Trump and elect environmental champions down the ballot. I’m reachingout because their ability to keep going depends on you, Peter. Folks from allover the country have been pitching in — $5, $10, $50 — to help turn outenvironmental voters. But if we’re going to win in the swing states ofPennsylvania, Michigan, Wisconsin, North Carolina, Nevada, and Arizona — it’sgoing to take all of us. Our team has knocked on more than 3 MILLION doors instates that could be decided by a small number of votes. We’re STILL reachingvoters who are undecided. Are you with us? Today is the final day of our pre-election fundraising campaign. A group of donors is triple matching everycontribution until midnight.https://links.messages.lcv. YOUR 3X GIFT >>https://links.messages.lcv. know what’s at stake. The future of our democracy — and of our planet —comes down to what happens in the next few days. Every. Single. Vote.Counts.I’ve never seen an election polling this close — where virtually everyswing state is a true toss-up. When things are this close, victory will comedown to turnout. If the environmental movement turns out, I know we canwin.And I also know that if voters who support our issues stay home, Trumpwill be our next president. So we’re asking one last time today — please, helpour organizers knock on doors, call, and text to get environmental voters tothe polls. It’s the final weekend before Election Day — our organizers areworking around the clock, running on cold coffee and even colder pizza. We’reasking everyone who can to pitch in to let them know: we’re cheering you on!TRIPLE YOUR IMPACT: Help turn out environmental voters in PA, MI, WI, NC, NV,and AZ. Let our organizers know you’ve got their backs! Even $5 helps >>https://links.messages.lcv.org/els/v2/k_ypT7qP~ YOUR 3X GIFT >>https://links.messages.lcv., Peter — for everything you do for people and the planet! Onward, PeteMaysmith Senior Vice President, Campaigns LCV Victory Fund Paid for by LCVVictory Fund,www.lcvvictoryfund.orghttps://links.messages.lcv.org/els/v2/rNykfE3Ze-,and not authorized by any candidate or candidate's committee. This email wassent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. If this isn't the best email address at which toreach you,update your contact informationhttps://www.pages08.net/leagueofconservationvoters/forms/ContactInformation?spMailingID=11713618&spUserID;=NjA3MDU0MTAzNTc3S0&spJobID;=MjEwMDAyNjY5MQS2&spReportId;=MjEwMDAyNjY5MQS2.Clickhere to unsubscribehttps://www.pages08.net/leagueofconservationvoters/forms/Unsubscribe?spMailingID=11713618&spUserID;=NjA3MDU0MTAzNTc3S0&spJobID;=MjEwMDAyNjY5MQS2&spReportId;=MjEwMDAyNjY5MQS2from our supporter list.Send us any comments, criticisms, or feedback heremailto:feedback@lcv.org?subject=, or just reply to this email! Thanks for yoursupport. 740 15th St NW, Suite 700 Washington, DC 20005 202-785-8683

name: Ted Cruz
subject: If you care about keeping Texas red…
body: We’re running out of time to close the gap Fellow Patriot, I’m the Democrats’number one target in November. We’re running out of time to KEEP TEXAS RED.So I’m coming to you, Fellow Patriot. My team has prepared a confidentialmemo, just for you, about what we must do to slam the door shut and take Texasoff the map. You can read it below. -Ted Cruz Memo from Team Cruz: First,Kamala Harris and Chuck Schumer hand-picked Colin Allred to run against TedCruz in Texas — and he raised a RECORD amount of money. Then, polls showedhis attack ads were working. He was within TWO POINTS of defeating Ted earlierthis year. Now, thanks to conservatives like you standing with us, Ted is upby FOUR. But that’s still within the margin of error. We’re still beingoutspent. Ted Cruz barely hanging on. With less than 3 days to go, we MUSTslam the door shut on liberal schemes to flip Texas blue. If we don’t, kissthe Senate goodbye for at least a generation. Fellow Patriot, will you rush adonation of any amount to help Ted Cruz keep up the fight, win this race, andcontinue defending our conservative values for years to come? RUSH A DONATION>> If you want to help Republicans TAKE BACK THE SENATE, text WIN to 55404 toreceive mobile alerts! Message and data rates may apply. Text "STOP" to opt-out. T&C;/Privacy Policy. committee: Donald J. Trump for President 2024, Inc.
name: Team Trump

name: Ted Cruz
subject: Why is my race so close?
body: Don’t let an Open Borders Radical win Don’t let an Open Borders Radical winPatriot, As you know, I’m in a razor close race against liberal Democrat ColinAllred. That’s why I’ve been barnstorming the state and sending so many emailsasking for help. I truly appreciate all you’ve done to support my campaign.But I still need help-this race is still too close! Why is my race so close?Unfortunately, one reason is that my opponent Colin Allred is untruthful, andis attempting to hide his radical liberal views from Texas voters. It takes alot of time and money to set the record straight… For example, on the borderAllred now claims to love border security, and belatedly says he wants to finda solution to the Biden-Harris border crisis, but that’s not how Allred votedin Congress… In Congress, Allred was an Open Borders Radical who voted AGAINSTthe interests of Texas and FOR open borders lawlessness numerous times: Allredvoted AGAINST the Secure the Border Act. Allred voted AGAINST denouncing theBiden Administration’s immigration policies. Allred voted AGAINST condemningthe Biden border crisis and the tremendous burdens law enforcement officersface as a result. Allred voted AGAINST the POLICE Act, which would immediatelydeport any illegal alien who assaults a law enforcement officer. Allred votedAGAINST the SAVE Act, which was a bill that would block illegal aliens fromvoting in U.S. elections. And perhaps most shamefully, Allred SKIPPED a voteon the End the Border Catastrophe Act… It takes a lot of time and money to setthe record straight…and of course the liberal media is working overtime tohelp Allred hide his record. If you can, please chip in $5, $10, or $25 now tohelp me call Colin Allred out before it’s too late >> Thank you! Ted CruzDONATE NOW >> Paid for by Ted Cruz for Senate 815 A Brazos, PMB 550, Austin,TX 78701 Unsubscribe

name: Ryan Mackenzie
subject: We’re down, but we’re not out.
body: We’re down, but we’re not out. The future of America is hanging in thebalance. And it’s all coming down to this race in the heart of Pennsylvania. Anew poll just came out showing that my race is a toss-up, but it’s stillleaning to the Left. And I only have 3 days to turn this around. My opponentwants me to give up now. But I’M NOT BACKING DOWN! My name is Ryan Mackenzie.I’m a state representative, smart conservative, proud father, and Trump-endorsed candidate. Now, I’m running for Congress in the MOST CRITICALbattleground race of 2024! If I lose here in the heart of Pennsylvania, ourhopes to save this country will be DEAD IN THE WATER! MILLIONS in dark moneydonations from the DNC are being pumped into my district to stop me. I needyour help to level the playing field. If we lose this seat, it will be aDISASTER for the Republican agenda in 2024. That’s why I’m calling on you. I’mlaunching a grassroots effort to FLIP THIS SEAT! But I need your support tomake this happen. Can my team count on your support to get boots on the groundand turn the tides of this election? Even with my back to the wall, we’venever been closer to victory! We can defeat these radical left loons, but onlyif we fight together. If you chip in today I can make you this promise, I willNEVER stop fighting for this country. JOIN THE FIGHT PAID FOR BY MACKENZIEFOR CONGRESS Unsubscribe |Mark as Junk

name: Katrina Christiansen
subject: An incredibly tough decision, Peter
body: I just left a critically important meeting with my team, Peter. As a topsupporter of my campaign, you deserve to be in the loop. The election is daysaway, and right now we are falling short of our budget goal. After pouringover our polling, it became clear: If we had a bit more money, we could reachthe undecided voters we need to win this race. The money wasn’t in the budget,but I gave the green light to ramp up our ad spending.[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/katrina_email?amount=15] It’s a risk. Butin a race this close and this important, it would be a mistake for us not toleave it all out on the field. I told my team that as the race tightens, oursupporters would step up to fill this budget gap to help us defeat extremeRepublican Kevin Cramer and keep the Senate out of Republicans’ hands. So I’mhumbly asking: Can I count on you to rush $15 before midnight to help fillthis budget gap and power my campaign in the final stretch? I’ve never neededyour support more than I do at this moment. >>[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/katrina_email?amount=15] Peter, I'm in thefight of my life to win this race and flip this Senate seat for Democrats. Iknow this race is going to be so incredibly close. I can’t afford to letCramer take even one vote from us. Our entire shot to win this critical Senateseat rests on whether I can close my budget gap and spread my message to everylast voter in time.[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/katrina_email?amount=15] Peter, I’m beyondgrateful you’re a part of this movement. And now, with just 3 days to go, I’masking you to take the next step. Will you chip in $15 – or whatever you can –to my campaign right away? Your support can help me close my budget gap, reachevery last voter before it’s too late, and ensure I have what it takes todefeat Kevin Cramer in 3 days. >>[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/katrina_email?amount=15] Chip in $15 now >>[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/katrina_email?amount=15] Chip in $25 now >>[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/katrina_email?amount=25] Chip in $50 now >>[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/katrina_email?amount=50] Chip in $100 now>> [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/katrina_email?amount=100] Chip inanother amount now >>[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/katrina_email?amount=25] Thank you forstanding with me, Katrina https://www.facebook.com/katrinaussenate[https://www.facebook.com/katrinaussenate ]https://www.instagram.com/katrinaforussenate/[https://www.instagram.com/katrinaforussenate/ ] katrinaforussenate.com[https://www.katrinaforussenate.com/] Friends of Katrina Christiansen P.O. Box833 Jamestown, ND 58402 United States Paid for by Friends of KatrinaChristiansen Katrina Christiansen is tired of career politicians who putspecial interest cash above the needs of hardworking families. That’s whyshe’s running for U.S. Senate to ensure no family has to choose between payingfor essential medication and putting food on the table. Katrina doesn’t take apenny of Corporate PAC money, so she’s relying on support from grassrootsdonors to fund her campaign and compete with Republicans’ deep pockets. Willyou chip in any amount before midnight to help Katrina defeat Republicanspecial interests and flip this seat for everyday North Dakotans? name: Sherrod Brown
subject: where things stand
body: Friend, with just three days until Election Day, here's where things stand:FIRST: GOP super PACs outspent us 3-to-1 to attack me on the airwaves, helpingmake this the most expensive Senate race in history. THEN: Four new polls werejust released, showing me trailing my MAGA opponent. Meanwhile,FiveThirtyEight says Democrats have no chance of holding the Senate if we losemy race. NOW: We're launching one final TV ad to help us reach voters and pullahead in this final stretch – but we need to raise $500,000 by midnight tomake it happen, and we're still falling short. The attack ads, lies, and smearcampaigns just keep coming, and to stay competitive, we need to launch thisfinal ad to shore up the voters we need to win. Going dark now could cost usthis race and the Senate. That's why I'm urgently asking: Will you please rush$10 or whatever you're able to split between my campaign and Jacky Rosen’s sothat I can reach my $500,000 goal by midnight, launch our final TV ads, andkeep this seat and the Senate blue?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/rosenfornevada_brown?refcode=jtk5294-bu-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 Thank you, Sherrod -------- This email was sentto dpwillis67@gmail.com. name: DLCC Elections Team
subject: Will you help lead the charge to elect state Dems?
body: In an ultra-competitive presidential election year, our candidates are competing for press, volunteers, ad space, and donors against races at the top of the ticket. | | |  --- | ![](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/097/354/original/2023_09_Email-Wrapper-Graphic_B_v2.png) |  ---|--- **President Obama said it best:** ![Obama Callout Gif](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/081/241/original/Updated_Obama_em_GIF_.gif) State legislators make decisions that impact your life the most – from the roads you drive on, to the lessons taught in our classrooms. It’s these leaders who will have the most direct effect on communities like yours. But state legislative campaigns are constantly overlooked and underfunded. In an ultra-competitive presidential election year, our candidates are competing for press, volunteers, ad space, and donors against races at the top of the ticket. **That’s where you come in:** **By chipping in a 5X-matched gift of $25, $50, or even just $7, you can give state Democrats the resources they need to compete on Tuesday. With smaller budgets and campaign staff, your donation will go furthest at the state level and will make 5X the impact before our final deadline on Sunday. ** Will you help lead the charge with a 5X-matched donation of $7 or more to build Democratic power in places like your community? You’ll own a stake in each of our victories on Election Day → | If you've stored your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will process immediately.  --- | 5X-MATCH $7 --- | 5X-MATCH $25 --- | 5X-MATCH $50 --- | 5X-MATCH $100 --- | 5X-MATCH $250 --- | OTHER » ---  Let’s do this.Team DLCC   **5X-MATCH: ACTIVE »** **MAKE IT MONTHLY »**             | --- Paid for by the Democratic Legislative Campaign Committee, dlcc.org. Notauthorized by any candidate or candidate's committee.  Contributions or gifts to DLCC are not tax deductible. | The Democratic Legislative Campaign Committee is dedicated to winning and defending Democratic majorities in state legislatures across the country. We’re so excited for this final stretchof campaigning, and it’s been amazing to see all of the momentum. This weekendis our final push to get out the vote, and we need all hands on deck.secure.actblue.com/donate/am24_em?refcode=241101_am_gotv[secure.actblue.com/donate/am24_em?refcode=241101_am_gotv] I’ve long believedin the power of good conversations, and I’ve made getting out in the communityand talking to folks a big part of my campaign. Helping folks make a plan tovote has been one of the most rewarding parts of running for office. If youcan help give our final GOTV efforts an extra boost it would mean the world tome. We still need to keep our fundraising numbers up so that we can keeprunning our new ad in these final few days. Will you pitch in now?[http://secure.actblue.com/donate/am24_em?refcode=241101_am_gotv] If you'vesaved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your secure donation willgo through immediately: Contribute $10[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/am24_em?express_lane=true&amount;=10&refcode;=241101_am_gotv]Contribute $25[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/am24_em?express_lane=true&amount;=25&refcode;=241101_am_gotv]Contribute $50[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/am24_em?express_lane=true&amount;=50&refcode;=241101_am_gotv]Contribute $100[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/am24_em?express_lane=true&amount;=100&refcode;=241101_am_gotv]Chip in any amount[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/am24_em?refcode=241101_am_gotv] Thank you!We hope to see you this weekend. — Andrea Morse Andrea Morse, a proud ThirdGeneration Staten Islander, is deeply rooted in the fabric of our community.Raised with the values of hard work and solidarity, she is the granddaughterof a dedicated Union Machinist and the wife of a Union Carpenter. name: Engel HQ
subject: We know the truth
body: https://engelforarizona.com [https://engelforarizona.com] Peter, JuanCiscomani and his super PAC allies are flooding our TVs trying to paint acertain picture of who he is: a moderate who “trusts women” and will fight forArizona. We know the truth. Juan Ciscomani served on the board of the PatriotAcademy for 14 years. It’s a Christian nationalist organization that wants toban abortion, end same-sex marriage, and rewrite the US Constitution. Since hetook office, he’s voted to restrict IVF and abortion access, attack the LGBTQ+community, end clean energy jobs, and slash funding for Social Security &Medicare. We know who he is — and we’re working hard to make sure everyone inArizona’s Sixth Congressional District does, too. Every dollar makes adifference. We have three days until the election so we have to ask: can youdonate now?[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/engel2024_pa?refcode=X_110224_PatriotAcademy_act]If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donationwill go through immediately: DONATE $5[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/engel2024_pa?express_lane=true&amount;=5&refcode;=X_110224_PatriotAcademy_act]DONATE $10[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/engel2024_pa?express_lane=true&amount;=10&refcode;=X_110224_PatriotAcademy_act]DONATE $25[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/engel2024_pa?express_lane=true&amount;=25&refcode;=X_110224_PatriotAcademy_act]DONATE $50[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/engel2024_pa?express_lane=true&amount;=50&refcode;=X_110224_PatriotAcademy_act]DONATE $100[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/engel2024_pa?express_lane=true&amount;=100&refcode;=X_110224_PatriotAcademy_act]DONATE OTHER[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/engel2024_pa?express_lane_other=true&refcode;=X_110224_PatriotAcademy_act]Thank you so much, Engel HQhttps://secure.actblue.com/donate/engel2024_pa?refcode=X_110224_PatriotAcademy_act[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/engel2024_pa?refcode=X_110224_PatriotAcademy_act]Kirsten is a mom, an environmental attorney, and a former State Legislator whohas spent the past six years fighting to restore funding to public schools,protect Arizona's natural resources, and make our communities safer. name: Sara Jacobs
subject: Voting is fun, easy, and everyone is doing it
body: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/sjj-em[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/sjj-em] “Voting is fun. Voting is easy. Andeveryone is doing it!” When you’re an organizer, that sentence is one of thefirst things you learn about getting out the vote. The #1 way to make surepeople actually go vote is by letting them know those three facts. Voting isfun. Not only are you exercising your civic duty and your fundamental right byvoting, you also get a great sticker! Voting is easy. Between the 200+ earlyvote centers in San Diego County, the ballots mailed directly to voters, andthe official ballot drop boxes, voting is so easy . Everyone is doing it. Herein CA, more than five million people have already returned their ballots. It’sa party! So as you’re going about your weekend, whether you’re canvassing,phonebanking, or just running errands, I hope you’ll tell everyone you talk tothat voting is fun, easy, and everyone is doing it – and then remind them togo to IWillVote.com [https://iwillvote.com/] for any and all information theyneed to go vote! If you’re looking for volunteer opportunities in these finaldays, you can find them here [https://go.kamalaharris.com/] . And if you stillneed to return your own ballot…what are you waiting for?! Go, vote, win! -Sarahttps://secure.actblue.com/donate/sjj-em[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/sjj-em] Congresswoman Sara JacobsCalifornia’s 51st District CONTRIBUTE [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/sjj-em] If you can’t give much right now, I want you to know that even $1 or $5makes a difference. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/sjj-em] And if youcan’t give at all, I understand. I appreciate you taking the time to readthese emails and stay connected with my campaign – regardless of whether ornot you’re able to chip in financially. name: C. Allred
subject: I'm going to tell it like it is
body: Friend, we face our critical $500,000 daily fundraising deadline at midnight tonight, so I'm going to tell it like it is: – Ted Cruz won his last election by only 2.6%. – Thanks to his GOP mega donors, he's raised over $59 MILLION. – Right now, we're falling way short of our goal, and time is running out to close the gap. Ted Cruz's extremist donors and special interests are scared because they know we can win this thing, with a recently released poll showing us ahead in this race. They're throwing everything they've got behind him. I'm counting on you to ensure I can compete with Cruz's mega donors. So, with our critical deadline approaching, can you chip in a split donation between my campaign and Kirsten Gillibrand's of any amount you're able to so that we have the resources to send Ted Cruz packing for good? → https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/gfs_colinallred?refcode=jtk5619-bu-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Thank you for joining my fight to fire Ted Cruz. – Colin -------- This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. Friend, With just three daysleft until Election Day, our voter outreach operation is in full effect. Thisis a crucial moment for our campaign. Two entirely different futures are onthe ballot this year. One vote can make the difference between which futurewill define our country. I am asking for your help, both on the ground and ina different way: please consider making one last contribution to fuel ourcampaign’s final efforts. Your support will directly help us reach everycorner of the district and ensure no voice is left unheard. Together, we canmake history. Let us win for New Jersey, and for America. Thank you and staysafe, Tom LET'S FINISH WHAT WE STARTED Paid for by Kean for Congress IncCopyright © 2024 Kean for Congress Our mailing address is: Kean for CongressInc PO Box 999 Edison, NJ 08818 Click here to mail your donation. If youwould like to donate online, please visit our website here . Be sure to followthe campaign on Facebook , Instagram , Twitter , and YouTube . If you have anysuggestions, comments, complaints, or feedback, please send your ideastoinfo@TomKean.com . Click here to unsubscribe

name: Kevin Lincoln
subject: Worried you’re sleeping on this
body: Kevin Lincoln for Congress Our borders won’t be secured, inflation won’t godown, communities won’t get safer, and government overreach won’t be reeledin. I’m worried you’re sleeping on this, fellow American. Democrats have beenleading in the Generic Congressional Ballot for three months now, meaning moreAmericans would rather send a Democrat to represent them in Congress than aRepublican. We can take back the White House and the Senate, but if we losethe House – which we only hold by a handful of seats –we can’t get anythingdone. Our borders won’t be secured, inflation won’t go down, communities won’tget safer, and government overreach won’t be reeled in. That’s why yoursupport for Republican victories in target battleground seats is so critical.We can’t miss out on real chances to flip vulnerable Democrat-held seats likethis one in CA-9. SEND A MARINE TO CONGRESS ➞ I’m fighting tooth and naildown the home stretch, and I need your help to close the deal. As a MarineCorps veteran, former pastor, and current Mayor, I’m ready to bring serviceand leadership to Congress to get our country back on track. But I need yourhelp. Don’t sleep on this. Flip this seat, protect our Republican HouseMajority, and secure the future of our country by chipping in to support mycampaign today. For America, Kevin Lincoln Veteran, USMC SEND A MARINE TOCONGRESS ➞ Meet Kevin Lincoln My name is Kevin Lincoln, and my story, is theValley’s story. I am a 3rd generation Stocktonian, raising a 4th generation inthe city I love. I’m the grandson of Mexican immigrants, and my stepfather isan Army veteran. Like many Stocktonians, my family has overcome economicsetbacks. My own father struggled to survive on these streets, and was at onetime, homeless. But I never let adversity define me. I joined the Marines andserved in the White House Military Office, assigned to Marine One. I graduatedcollege while working full-time and raising a family. I’ve worked in corporateAmerica and served our community as a pastor, and as a non-profit leader. I’mblessed with a beautiful wife, Bonnie, and two amazing children. I’ve lived alife of service, but the greatest honor of my life has been giving back to mycommunity, through serving as Mayor of my hometown, Stockton. SEND A MARINE TOCONGRESS ➞ Like, Follow, and Subscribe! Kevin Lincoln is a former member ofthe U.S. Marine Corps. Use of his military rank, job titles, and photographsin uniform does not imply endorsement by the Marine Corps or the Department ofDefense. PAID FOR BY KEVIN LINCOLN FOR CONGRESS We'd hate to see you go but ifyou'd like to unsubscribe, click here.

name: Steve Garvey
subject: Important message
body: What matters most right now is that we do whatever we can to fund a campaignthat can win. That’s the most important thing. Winning this race.                                                                                                                  Fellow Patriot,I have an important message that I didn’t think I’d be sending you today. Injust a moment, I am going to ask you to make a contribution to my campaign forU.S. Senate. November 5th isdays away, and I’d really appreciate the chance toexplain why this request — especially today — is so critically important.Here’s the truth: Right now, we have a week of media buys to pay for — themost important week of the entire campaign. And if we don’t raise what we neednow, we will be forced to give up the airwaves and let Adam Schiff and theDemocrat-machine backing him up run their attacks on me unopposed. Whatmatters most right now is that we do whatever we can to fund a campaign thatcan win. That’s the most important thing. Winning this race. Not just for thesake of winning, but because of what it would mean to substitute my presencewith Adam Schiff’s in the Senate. That’s a reality I don’t think any of uswant to consider, but it’s what will happen if we come up short. Now, time isrunning out. So, this is the part where I ask, one more time, and very humbly:Can you please use this link to make a donation to my campaign for U.S. Senatein California before Election Day? These emails are how we fund our campaign,and I really need you to chip in and help prevent us from falling behind.DONATE $35 DONATE $100 DONATE $500 DONATE $50 DONATE $250 DONATE $1000DONATE $35 DONATE $50 DONATE $100 DONATE $250 DONATE $500 DONATE $1000OTHER AMOUNT Thank you Fellow Patriot, and God bless, DONATE <> PAID FOR BYSTEVE GARVEY FOR U.S. SENATE PO Box 532389 Los Angeles, CA 90053-2389Unsubscribe here

name: Donald Trump Jr.
subject: Not a lot of time
body: Bernie Moreno for US Senate Time is running out. That’s why I am campaigningwith Bernie Moreno in Ohio. Fellow patriot – Don Jr. here. I am on thecampaign trail with Bernie Moreno in Ohio. I know you’re getting so manyemails,but will you take less than 30 seconds to watch this video I recordedjust for you? Thanks, Don Jr. WATCH NOW » Paid for by Bernie Moreno forSenate Don't want to receive any more of our emails? We hate to see you go:unsubscribe .

name: Angela Alsobrooks
subject: the longest email I’ll send
body: [https://act.angelaalsobrooks.com/go/33436?t=1009&amount;=25&akid;=3181%2E52803%2E7kOuRk][IMG] Peter, this is probably the longest email you’ll ever get from me. Butit’s also one of the most important, so it really would mean a lot to me ifyou could read through it. If you’re in a hurry or if you’re already sold andready to do whatever it takes to help me defeat Larry Hogan and defend ourSenate majority, [https://act.angelaalsobrooks.com/go/33436?t=1010&amount;=25&akid;=3181%2E52803%2E7kOuRk]then please consider making a quick grassroots contribution to give us theresources and momentum to win this race in just 3 days! [https://act.angelaalsobrooks.com/go/33436?t=1011&amount;=25&akid;=3181%2E52803%2E7kOuRk]Donate I want to outline our campaign's message to fill Maryland’s open U.S.Senate seat. It hinges on 3 major components: Power to the People Thiscampaign has never been about me, Peter. It’s always been about Marylanders,our families, and our communities. And when Republican Larry Hogan entered therace putting our Democratic Senate majority at risk, it became about thefuture of the entire country. That’s why Republicans are pouring millions ofdollars into this race. But during the Democratic Primary, we proved thatMaryland is won by the many, not by the money. We’ve never had limitlessresources, million dollar checks, or shady dark money super PACs pulling thestrings. Instead, we built a grassroots coalition of people in every corner ofthe state who stepped up to volunteer, donate, and talk to their neighborsabout our campaign. Your time and your contributions were the driving forcebehind our primary victory, and we need to continue building on that in orderto win on Tuesday. Focus on the Issues that Matter While Republicans arelining up to get behind Donald Trump and his divisive MAGA agenda, we'refocusing on the issues that matter most to people — like protecting abortionrights, improving wages, and preserving our democracy. My Republican opponentLarry Hogan hopes Marylanders won’t remember that as governor, he vetoedlegislation that would have expanded access to abortion care throughout thestate. He’s banking on Marylanders forgetting that he vetoed a $15 minimumwage and legislation to benefit unions and workers. He’s hoping Marylanderswon’t realize that electing him means handing control of the Senate over toextremists like Ted Cruz and Lindsey Graham. On the issues that matter most,Hogan’s record speaks for itself: He’s all wrong for Maryland, and he’ll sayand do whatever he thinks will win him this seat. Make the Case for aDemocratic Senate Majority Here’s the truth, Peter: There simply isn’t any wayDemocrats maintain our razor-thin Senate majority if Larry Hogan wins thisopen seat. Mitch McConnell handpicked Hogan for this race because he seesMaryland as his best chance to flip a seat, retake the majority, and enact hisfar-right, anti-choice agenda. If the GOP retakes the Senate, they'll have thepower to pass a national abortion ban, roll back environmental protections,undermine our elections, and so much more. Hogan has proven that he cannot betrusted to protect our reproductive rights or put Maryland families first.Defending the Senate is the only way to protect our freedoms, uplift workingfamilies, and preserve our democracy. We’ve got a winning message that’sresonating with voters, Peter, and I need your support to make sure everyonehears it. [https://act.angelaalsobrooks.com/go/33436?t=1012&amount;=25&akid;=3181%2E52803%2E7kOuRk]Can I count on you to chip in $25 to give our grassroots team the resourceswe need to reach Marylanders across the state? If you’ve saved your paymentinformation with ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately. [https://act.angelaalsobrooks.com/go/33436?t=1013&express;_lane=true&amount;=25&akid;=3181%2E52803%2E7kOuRk]Chip in $25 [https://act.angelaalsobrooks.com/go/33436?t=1014&express;_lane=true&amount;=50&akid;=3181%2E52803%2E7kOuRk]Chip in $50 [https://act.angelaalsobrooks.com/go/33436?t=1015&express;_lane=true&amount;=100&akid;=3181%2E52803%2E7kOuRk]Chip in $100 [https://act.angelaalsobrooks.com/go/33436?t=1016&express;_lane=true&amount;=200&akid;=3181%2E52803%2E7kOuRk]Chip in $200 [https://act.angelaalsobrooks.com/go/33436?t=1007&express;_lane=true&amount;=250&akid;=3181%2E52803%2E7kOuRk]Chip in $250 [https://act.angelaalsobrooks.com/go/33436?t=1008&amount;=35&akid;=3181%2E52803%2E7kOuRk]Other Amount Thank you for taking the time to read this, Peter. Together,Angela Alsobrooks [https://act.angelaalsobrooks.com/go/89?t=1001&akid;=3181%2E52803%2E7kOuRk][IMG] We believe that emails are the best way for our organization to stay intouch with supporters like you. But if you'd like to receive fewer emails, [https://act.angelaalsobrooks.com/signup/fewer-emails/?t=1002&akid;=3181%2E52803%2E7kOuRk ]click here. Our college tour hit campuses inFlorida, Ohio, Arizona, Minnesota, Pennsylvania, Nevada, Georgia, Michigan,North Carolina – all to rally young voters for Harris-Walz. And we’re alreadyseeing results! Early turnout numbers are surging on college campuses in keybattlegrounds like North Carolina, Michigan and Georgia – and it’s all thanksto people like you, Peter. But guess what? We’re STILL not finished. From nowuntil Election Day, my focus is on Florida. I’ll be on University of CentralFlorida’s campus til’ the polls close, golf-carting students to their pollingplace and reminding them that it’s OK to take a study break to go vote. Morethan OK – it’s critical. This is one of the few campuses with a pollinglocation on site, so everything we do these last few days can make animmediate impact. But I can’t do it alone. I’m counting on you to fuel thisfight until the very end. Peter, will you rush $27 to help fund our last pushto mobilize young voters at University of Central Florida and across Florida?Any of these votes could be the ONE we need to defeat fascism in name: Ted Cruz
subject: I’m barely hanging on in Texas
body: so I’m coming to you, Fellow Patriot Fellow Patriot, I’m the Democrats’ numberone target in November. We’re running out of time to KEEP TEXAS RED. So I’mcoming to you, Fellow Patriot. My team has prepared a confidential memo, justfor you, about what we must do to slam the door shut and take Texas off themap. You can read it below. -Ted Cruz Memo from Team Cruz: First, KamalaHarris and Chuck Schumer hand-picked Colin Allred to run against Ted Cruz inTexas — and he raised a RECORD amount of money. Then, polls showed his attackads were working. He was within TWO POINTS of defeating Ted earlier this year.Now, thanks to conservatives like you standing with us, Ted is up by FOUR.But that’s still within the margin of error. We’re still being outspent. TedCruz barely hanging on. With less than 3 days to go, we MUST slam the doorshut on liberal schemes to flip Texas blue. If we don’t, kiss the Senategoodbye for at least a generation. name: Hung Cao
subject: Knock knock knock
body: Knock, knock, knock. It’s the scariest sound you’ll hear when you live in acommunist country. It’s the last sound my parents heard when their fatherswere taken away. It’s the sound of always living in fear, and it’s my family’sreal-life story. We escaped from Vietnam just days before Saigon fell to thecommunists, and we were given a new life in the most generous country onEarth. America saved my life, and I dedicated my life to paying her back. Igraduated from the United States Naval Academy and served for 25 years in NavySpecial Operations in Iraq, Afghanistan, Somalia, and Pakistan and 40 othercountries around the world. I love this country - but right now, it’s taken adark turn. Now, the knocks are coming from Joe Biden’s Department of Justice.Sending two dozen armed agents to arrest a pro-life activist in front of hisfamily. Raiding gun shops and seizing records from law-abiding gun owners.Arresting his challenger in the next election. And he’s doing it all whilereal criminals are free to roam our streets. We are losing our country. Youknow it. But you also know we can save it. I’ve been all over the world.Believe me when I tell you, if America fails, there is nowhere else to go.It’s time to save America while we still have a chance. I’m Hung Cao, retiredNavy Captain, and I’m running for the United States Senate. If you’re all-into defend the greatest country on Earth, join our team today. JOIN THE TEAM -STAND WITH ME TODAY I still believe America can be the land of opportunity,Fellow Patriot. And as someone who owes their life to the American Dream, Ihave an obligation to fight back against those who have trampled on it. Weneed REAL fighters. Not politicians, not bureaucrats, and not keyboardwarriors acting tough in custom made suits. If we’re going to preserve ourfreedoms, we can’t be intimidated. We must be fearless. It’s time to fight forthe American greatness that lies within us. Join our team today - because Iknow you haven’t given up on America yet either. JOIN THE TEAM - STAND WITHME TODAY Let’s win this. In Liberty, CAPT Hung Cao, USN (Ret) Former NavySpecial Operations Candidate, U.S. Senate (VA) TEXT HUNG TO 21412 JOIN TEAMCAO! Paid for by Hung Cao for Virginia Use of military rank, job titles, andphotographs in uniform does not imply endorsement by the Department of theNavy or the Department of Defense. Unsubscribe.

subject: Our country is in desperate need of new, progressive leaders
body: [1]Justice Democrats Peter, the 2024 general election is only three days away.On Tuesday, we face a critical presidential election that will have impactsfor decades to come, in addition to important races for Congress, statelegislatures, and local office. Regardless of the outcome, it's clear that ourcountry is divided and in desperate need of new leaders who can unify everydaypeople across our shared priorities and against our shared enemies:corporations, billionaires, and right-wing extremists. Everyday people don'tsee any party fighting for their interests anymore. They see what we see:corporate Super PACs and billionaire donors dictating an agenda that rewardsthe wealthy few at the expense of everyone else. The outcomes of Tuesday'selection will drastically reshape the future of our nation and will demanddifferent urgencies from our movement. But no matter what, this moment callsfor building a new Democratic Party, led by new leaders that working familiesactually see fighting for their most pressing needs. body: [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/67?t=1001&akid;=4419%2E35263%2EJ_kbYW ]TAMMY BALDWIN FOR SENATE Team Baldwin here, Peter, with an urgent polling memo from Wisconsin’s Senate race. InsiderAdvantage — October 2024 Eric Hovde (R): 49% [+1] Tammy Baldwin (D): 48% Ever since Eric Hovde closed the polling gap in this race, Republicans see Wisconsin as one of their best opportunities to flip a Democrat-held Senate seat red. That’s why Hovde, Mitch McConnell, and their right-wing allies have poured $100 million into Wisconsin to defeat Tammy. Tammy’s opponent is surging at the worst possible time. Early and absentee voting is well underway. More than one million votes have already been cast, and we’re running out of time to get our message in front of voters before polls close in just three days. name: NDRC State Watch
subject: Kamala Harris is right →
body: Our rights are on the ballot this fall. Rush a $30 donation to the NDRC tohelp elect Democracy Defenders who will protect our freedoms >>[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ndrc-em-nov24?refcode=don_ndrc_tier1_email_TexasAbortion_email_20241102-NDRC-Tier1-TexasAbortion_&utm;_source=email&utm;_medium=email&utm;_term=don&utm;_content=20241102-NDRC-Tier1-TexasAbortion_&utm;_campaign=TexasAbortion&amount;=] DONATE[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ndrc-em-nov24?refcode=don_ndrc_tier1_email_TexasAbortion_email_20241102-NDRC-Tier1-TexasAbortion_&utm;_source=email&utm;_medium=email&utm;_term=don&utm;_content=20241102-NDRC-Tier1-TexasAbortion_&utm;_campaign=TexasAbortion&amount;=] Peter, did you seewhat Kamala Harris had to say about the state of reproductive health in Texas?“…Texas has a law now that offers a cash bounty for turning in someone whomerely helps a friend or a family member get the care they need. In Texas, thelaw provides prison for life, for healthcare providers, for doing what theybelieve is in the best interest of their patient. In some counties in Texas,they have passed travel bans to prevent women from going to other states toreceive care. These are the stakes — and we know how we got here. ” She’sright — we do know how we got here: In 2021, Texas completely banned abortionwith very limited exceptions. Then, the Texas Supreme Court then ruled that awoman did not qualify for an abortion under the state’s medical exceptiondespite the fact that her doctor determined she needed the procedure to saveher life. That decision forced a pregnant woman to travel out of state toreceive the care she needed to save her life. The justices doubled down onthat extreme decision this year, ruling against 20 women who said they weredenied the ability to receive medically necessary abortions as a result of thestate’s extreme abortion ban. This is unconscionable, Peter — and we won’t siton the sidelines while elected state supreme court justices rip away people’srights. The NDRC is proud to have endorsed Judge DaSean Jones, Judge ChristineWeems, and Judge Bonnie Lee Goldstein for the Texas Supreme Court because oftheir commitment to be fair-minded, conduct an independent evaluation of thelaw, ensuring rights and protecting freedoms. But we need your help to pushthese Democracy Defenders — and so many like them across the country — tovictory. Will you rush a $30 donation today to make sure our DemocracyDefenders have the resources they need to sprint through the finish name: Joyce
subject: it’s a sprint to November 5th
body: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/loc_fr_joycefornh_q12024?refcode=LOC_EM_FR_2024_header [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/loc_fr_joycefornh_q12024?refcode=LOC_EM_FR_2024_header] Peter, A campaign is just like a long-distance run. At first, you have to pace yourself. You need to save your energy for the grueling road ahead. But then — as the end approaches — you need to tap into your whatever energy you have left and sprint towards the finish line. Having run the Boston marathon 10 consecutive times, as we enter October, I feel like we’re taking that final turn onto Boylston and we’re in the final sprint to the finish line . We have just 3 days to Get Out the Vote, defeat Kelly Ayotte, and elect a Democratic Governor for the first time in almost a decade. name: Jude for Congress
subject: ✴️Make Voting Fun Again!
body: *** FIVE INTERESTING FACTS ABOUT VOTING Can we really say we have an “ElectionDay” anymore? So many people have already voted that it’s clear voting is nowmore a season than a single-day event. And while the way we vote might havechanged over the years, the importance of voting hasn't changed a bit. Do YouHave a Plan to Vote? Will You Bring a Friend Along to the Polls? Your votemight be the one that makes a difference in this election. With so much on theline in this election, we can’t afford to sit it out. I hope you enjoy thesefun voting facts (Make Voting Fun Again!), but most importantly, I hope youMAKE A PLAN TO VOTE! Five Fun Facts about Voting & Elections Absentee Voting:Must Be More than Two Miles from Home Pennsylvania was the first state toallow absentee voting during the War of 1812, but you had to be at least twomiles from home! Bring Your Own Ballot (BYOB?) It wasn’t until the election of1888 that ballots became standardized in the U.S. Before then, voters oftenbrought ballots passed out by political parties or wrote down their choices.Astronauts Can Vote from Space Thanks to a Texas law passed in 1997,astronauts can cast their votes from space. Using a secure ballot, NASAensures astronauts are never left out, even when orbiting the Earth. WhyTuesday? Why November? Tuesday was selected to avoid Sundays (for church) andWednesdays (market days for farmers). November was chosen because it was afterthe harvest season and before the harsh winter weather. Voting Wasn’t AlwaysSecret Before the 1890s, there was nothing secret about voting. In fact, atthat time, many people believed voting should be a public act. As these factsshow, voting has never been a perfect system, but it is the best way toparticipate in shaping the future you want for your family and your country. Ihope you’re planning to vote in this election. name: John Legend
subject: Did you catch me on MSNBC on behalf of my friend Sherrod Brown?
body: Hey, friend, John Legend here. Did you catch me on MSNBC just now on behalf ofmy friend Sherrod Brown? Most folks know me as a musician and coach on TheVoice, but I'm also a proud Ohioan. And I'm reaching out personally to ask youto join me in supporting Sherrod today. Most people don't know I grew up inSpringfield, Ohio. My mom was a seamstress and my dad was a factory worker,and I saw up close how hard they worked to support our family. That's why Ibelieve in what Sherrod calls the Dignity of Work – the idea that hard workshould pay off for everyone – and why I'm personally asking: Will you give $5to help Sherrod win reelection and keep the Senate blue?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/sherrod-brown-email-wr-24?refcode=jtk3797-fr-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 So much is on the linein Ohio. Senate control will be determined by Sherrod's race, so we must standtogether to protect reproductive rights, defend Social Security and Medicare,and save our democracy. This race is going to be tight. Polls show Sherrodnarrowly trailing his Trump-backed opponent, and political experts have calledSherrod one of the most vulnerable senators up for reelection. Republicanswill do anything to defeat Sherrod, and they've outspent him 3-to-1 to attackhim relentlessly. That's why I had to reach out, friend. Sherrod needs ourgrassroots support right away: Will you chip in $5 or $25 to help Sherrod winin Ohio and keep the Senate blue?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/sherrod-brown-email-wr-24?refcode=jtk3797-fr-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 Ohio means a lot to me,and the working families there – and across America – deserve to have Sherrodin the U.S. Senate. Please join me in supporting him. Appreciate you readingthis, friend, John Legend -------- This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Emilia Sykes
subject: The strength of our democracy relies on one simple premise
body: The strength of our democracy relies on one simple premise: one person, onevote. Every Northeast Ohioan deserves to have their voice heard and their votecounted. And when this election is over in three days, we need to be able tosay that we all showed up to decide the future of our nation. Throughout mytime in the state legislature and during my first term in Congress, I havealways worked to defend the freedom to vote. I support the John R. LewisVoting Rights Act and the Freedom to Vote Act. I will continue to work to keepour democratic institutions secure, and ensure that everyone can vote in freeand fair elections. I have always put the people first and fought to connectthis community to Congress, and I am running for re-election to continue doingso, but I need your support. This is a grassroots team, and that means we haveto work together.https://secure.actblue.com/donate/sykesq42024?&amount;=5&refcode;=em_fr_2024.11.02_b1_es_allPeter, we are just THREE days away from one of the most important elections ofour lifetime. I’m running for re-election to bring more good-paying jobs toour community, lower costs, keep our communities safe, and protect ourdemocracy. Can I please count on you to chip in $5 or whatever you can todayto help fuel us through the last 3 days of the election?https://secure.actblue.com/donate/sykesq42024?&amount;=5&refcode;=em_fr_2024.11.02_b1_es_allThank you so much for being on our team, Emilia Sykes -------------------- Anative of Akron, Ohio, Emilia Sykes has deep roots fighting for Ohioans. Shelearned from a young age how to use her voice and the power of the people tocreate change. In 2022, Congresswoman Sykes was elected to represent Ohio’snewly redrawn 13th Congressional District, winning one of the toughest racesin the country. Emilia has cut through the divisiveness to deliver results.Paid for by Emilia Sykes for Congress Emilia Sykes for Congress PO Box 1347Akron, OH 44309 United States If you believe you received this message inerror or wish to no longer receive email from us, please unsubscribe:https://secure.ngpvan.com/p/p2VFadhIBkGFICrUHBpJtA2?unsubscribedata=f8s93dUFevaYIvQot5wKCXK6CvebuotCuBKLJaw%2FmmvASczJUBsBnxmEPQ3GUTypGWFLVIqAR5rGME008sCpaGYYo2ILYhVoGkRc7VmOyCc3fCO3%2BiKN4q78ozQ03ikgIAq7w2UsmIfGRwRS6q0RpKul4pG6MdlYHj2C%2F137PinGB6%2BkJe7hHQBfCwk41ggv%2FnaOxou7QRt1EMZuPselBmnEiF%2Fcv%2FSEZKR03GLkB%2BO01W4dvLOW20inTMzu8ZQ4EBIE7f%2BU%2F5ugW3G%2F92eqJjYUZYca%2ByJaefoifqIMPcokp7jj60OIf5XBPnPa7Fo45rd7ajuySSERqZBfQlsqG2NNprJGyu2a3dWoV%2FlBfNwpTTyvBEkdoQ%2Fhq4NnkAoPwRhUlmS%2FMwlk0VJjIuqo%2FIYA4UcSMZBBDOCgYzFXk%2FJTCnrRtOoy9MueIsDTr5d8.

Whatever it may be — $1, $5, $10 — it all makes aHUGE difference in a race as close as this one. If you can, consider sending adonation of any amount my way before my election on Tuesday:[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/lm-em-fr-nov] If you've stored your paymentinformation with ActBlue Express, your donation will process now. name: Kamala Harris
subject: Will you watch our closing campaign ad, share it, and pitch in $47 so we can get it up on the airwaves?
body: Even at this late hour, there are still many voters who have yet to come to a decision about who they will support on Tuesday. | | |                                                                                                                                    --- ![Harris forPresident](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/111/764/original/HFP-Walz-SingleColor-HarrisBlue.png) I have said since the beginning that ours is a people-powered campaign. Whether you called your aunt to help her make a plan to vote, put a sign in your window, or donated to this campaign, you are doing the important work of powering our campaign to victory. _Thank you, Peter._ **But it will take millions of individuals acting together to preserve the promise of America.** And, even at this late hour, there are still many voters who have yet to come to a decision about who they will support on Tuesday. This weekend, folks all across the country are knocking on their neighbors’ doors and joining phone banks to have the critical conversations with voters we will need to turn out to win. Governor Walz and I will also be in key battleground states -- like Arizona, Georgia, and Michigan -- sharing our message with voters before they head to the polls. _But we cannot reach every single voter ourselves._ That is why our campaign is taking to the airwaves. **We are launching a special, two-minute long ad that will be our closing argument to undecided voters. I wanted you to be the first to see it, as it would not have been possible without supporters like you.** **Please watch this ad, share it with your network, and pitch in $47 to get it up on the airwaves.** ![Gif of Final Campaign Ad with Play Button](https://actionnetwork.org/s3_files/uploads/data/000/950/926/original/brighter_future.gif) | | WATCH THE AD ---  Running an ad like this is expensive, but it is important. Because we knowthat the more voters hear about our campaign, the more they support us.**We have only been able to run it so far because supporters like you havestepped up the way you have. But we can’t stop now.****So, Peter, will you click this link to watch our ad and make a contributionto help us spread the word to undecided voters? It would mean a lot to me.**Thank you and take care,KamalaKamala Harris Vice President of the United States![KamalaHarris](https://actionnetwork.org/s3_files/uploads/data/000/944/463/original/kamala_hopeful.jpg)          * * *| | DONATE --- | TAKE ACTION --- | SHOP ---  * * *This email was sent to **dpwillis67@gmail.com**. Thank you so much for being asupporter. But Peter, we don't want to bother you. If you’d like tounsubscribe from all Harris for President emails, you can **click here**. Wesincerely thank you for your help and support. Paid for by Harris forPresident. ---  ![](https://click.contact.kamalaharris.com/ss/o/u001.ZbNyqOfLYPaP-d23SgKjnQ/4b4/WGOyrALDRXqW4h4q20ugpA/ho.gif)

name: Derek Kilmer
subject: I don’t often send emails like this
body: Peter, I know you are probably getting a lot of political emails and texts, soI’ll make this quick: In just a few months, I’ll be closing out my 12 years inCongress. It’s been the honor of my life to serve the people of Washington’s6th District — and I want to do everything possible to ensure that we continueto have a committed, pragmatic, dedicated representative who shares ourvalues. That’s why I’m asking you to please make a contribution of any amountto help Emily Randall’s campaign get out the vote in the final days of thiselection and secure a win in this critical open seat. You can use this link:http://secure.actblue.com/donate/rs_er4c2024_fr_q42024?amount=[http://secure.actblue.com/donate/rs_er4c2024_fr_q42024?amount=] In the faceof negative ads from Republicans who want to take this seat, Emily iscontinuing to spread her positive message of making government work forworking people. Please dig deep. Every donation helps Emily reach more votersand gets us closer to victory in the 6th District. Here’s that link again:http://secure.actblue.com/donate/rs_er4c2024_fr_q42024?amount=[http://secure.actblue.com/donate/rs_er4c2024_fr_q42024?amount=] Thank you,Peter — I really appreciate anything you can give. In service, — Rep. name: Tim Sheehy
subject: We’re going dark
body: Tim Sheehy for Montana Honestly, the money gap is so large that there is adistinct possibility that my opponent will block us on the airwaves. We'regoing dark, Fellow Conservative - And it couldn’t come at a worse time. A newpoll has me TIED with my opponent less than a week out from Election Day. Ifyou don’t already know, here’s what happened. PLEASE LET ME EXPLAIN → “ "ISERVED AS A NAVY SEAL, BUILT ONE OF THE LARGEST AERIAL FIREFIGHTING COMPANIESIN AMERICA CREATING OVER 200 MONTANA JOBS, AND STARTED A VETERAN-LED CATTLERANCHING AND FEEDING OPERATION. WHETHER IT WAS IN WAR OR BUSINESS, I SEEPROBLEMS AND SOLVE THEM. AMERICA NEEDS CONSERVATIVE LEADERS WHO LOVE OURCOUNTRY. I'M RUNNING FOR THE U.S. SENATE BECAUSE OUR CAMPAIGN IS ABOUTSERVICE, DUTY, AND COUNTRY — NOT POLITICS AS USUAL." Unsubscribe PAID FOR BYTIM SHEEHY FOR MONTANA Tim Sheehy is a former Navy SEAL. name: Sharice Davids
subject: I’m proud of my record
body: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/davids-email?refcode=email-header[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/davids-email?refcode=email-header] It’s nosecret that there’s a lot of people in Congress who are only there to playpartisan politics and get their names trending on social media. But I’m notone of those people. So no, when I helped seniors across Kansas save hundredsof dollars in insulin every year, there weren’t wall-to-wall cable newsheadlines. But thousands of Kansans had one less kitchen table bill to worryabout. When the bipartisan infrastructure law I fought for finally passed, myname didn’t trend on Twitter. But we kickstarted over 300 constructionprojects right here in Kansas. And when we brought in millions of dollars tofund broadband expansion in rural communities, no, the New York Times didn’tsend a camera crew to our office to cover it. But we bridged the digital gapand got hundreds of rural communities connected and online. The fact is, I’mproud of my record of cutting through the partisanship and delivering realprogress for Kansas families. But we can’t expect anyone to get that messageout for us — it’s up to us, this team, to reach every single voter and showthem what we’ve gotten done. Can I count on you to pitch in a few dollarstoday and help us do exactly that? We need to make sure every single person inKS-03 knows what this campaign is about. Anything you can give would mean alot. Donate → [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/davids-email-nov24?refcode=email_110224_record&amounts;=5,25,50,75,100,250,500] Thank you,Sharice This email was sent to: dpwillis67@gmail.com. subject: The race for the Senate Majority has gotten closer
body: Peter, we hate to be blunt, but we have no other choice. The race to win theSenate Majority is closer than ever. There is way too much on the line for us tofall short. Can you spare a donation to help win back the majority? That's because dark money donors have poured $75million into Nevada to defeat me – and now, a new poll was released that showsme TIED with my far-right opponent . The only way I can fight back and pullahead is with your support. I know it may not sound like much, but it’sgrassroots supporters like you giving $5 or $25 at a time who can truly make acritical difference in this battleground race – not political experts orbillionaire megadonors. That’s why it’s so important we all do our part. subject: the last time ever
body: Click here to stop receiving emails about Dan Osborn's campaign in Nebraskafrom us. [https://secure.ngpvan.com/uB3EyayArUyKTBgRW_x--A2]https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241102mid-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&refcode2;=df374e17-4099-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&recurring;=true[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241102mid-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&refcode2;=df374e17-4099-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&recurring;=true]Hello,After Mitch McConnell spent $13.1 million attacking me on TV, a brand-new pollfrom shows me TIED with Republican Senator Deb Fischer here in Nebraska. Butwith less than 12 hours until our most important fundraising deadline of theentire campaign so far, we’re falling dangerously short of our goal and whatwe need to defeat Republican Deb Fischer and win this Senate seat. That’s whya group of donors is TRIPLING all gifts to help us hit our goal, fight backagainst Mitch McConnell’s Super PAC attacks, and win this Senate seat![https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241102mid-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&refcode2;=df374e17-4099-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&recurring;=true]We will not have another rare matching opportunity like this again. That’s whyit’s so crucial that you take full advantage of this final chance for everydollar you give to go THREE TIMES as far toward helping me win this Senateseat. We have an historic opportunity to finally elect a blue-collar worker tothe U.S. Senate – instead of another corporate lap dog.
