name: Hung Cao
subject: Knock knock knock
body: Knock, knock, knock. It’s the scariest sound you’ll hear when you live in acommunist country. It’s the last sound my parents heard when their fatherswere taken away. It’s the sound of always living in fear, and it’s my family’sreal-life story. We escaped from Vietnam just days before Saigon fell to thecommunists, and we were given a new life in the most generous country onEarth. America saved my life, and I dedicated my life to paying her back. Igraduated from the United States Naval Academy and served for 25 years in NavySpecial Operations in Iraq, Afghanistan, Somalia, and Pakistan and 40 othercountries around the world. I love this country - but right now, it’s taken adark turn. Now, the knocks are coming from Joe Biden’s Department of Justice.Sending two dozen armed agents to arrest a pro-life activist in front of hisfamily. Raiding gun shops and seizing records from law-abiding gun owners.Arresting his challenger in the next election. And he’s doing it all whilereal criminals are free to roam our streets. We are losing our country. Youknow it. But you also know we can save it. I’ve been all over the world.Believe me when I tell you, if America fails, there is nowhere else to go.It’s time to save America while we still have a chance. I’m Hung Cao, retiredNavy Captain, and I’m running for the United States Senate. If you’re all-into defend the greatest country on Earth, join our team today. JOIN THE TEAM -STAND WITH ME TODAY I still believe America can be the land of opportunity,Fellow Patriot. And as someone who owes their life to the American Dream, Ihave an obligation to fight back against those who have trampled on it. Weneed REAL fighters. Not politicians, not bureaucrats, and not keyboardwarriors acting tough in custom made suits. If we’re going to preserve ourfreedoms, we can’t be intimidated. We must be fearless. It’s time to fight forthe American greatness that lies within us. Join our team today - because Iknow you haven’t given up on America yet either. JOIN THE TEAM - STAND WITHME TODAY Let’s win this. In Liberty, CAPT Hung Cao, USN (Ret) Former NavySpecial Operations Candidate, U.S. Senate (VA) TEXT HUNG TO 21412 JOIN TEAMCAO! Paid for by Hung Cao for Virginia Use of military rank, job titles, andphotographs in uniform does not imply endorsement by the Department of theNavy or the Department of Defense. Unsubscribe.

name: Jon Tester
subject: grounded
body: Can I tell you a story about my family farm, folks?(https://act.protectvoting.org/go/83981?t=1002&akid;=17887%2E878179%2EtbMk5w)In 1910, my grandfather came to Montana. He found a piece of grassy land, tooka look at it, and said, “This is the place.” And that’s where the farm began.He farmed the land until the early 1940s, and then passed it down to my folks.In 1978, my wife Sharla and I took over the farm and we’re still here today,three generations and more than 40 years later. We’ve made a lot of progresshere — Sharla and I built a new home, several steel buildings, and morestorage. The truth is, I love this work. Yes, it makes for early mornings andlate nights during planting and harvest seasons — but it also keeps megrounded, and it gives me perspective on the issues we face every day. When Ithink about climate change, I’m thinking of folks on farms like mine,struggling with catastrophic droughts or historic levels of flooding. When Ithink about reforming the USPS, I’m thinking of the people in ruralcommunities across Montana who rely on timely mail delivery for theirmedication or Social Security checks. And when I think about infrastructure,I’m thinking of the rural towns near mine that need access to affordable,high-speed internet. These aren’t abstract issues or talking points. They’revery real challenges that deserve real solutions, and that’s what I’m fightingfor in Washington. I spend every single day trying to do right by workingfamilies, farmers, students, and veterans here in Montana and across thecountry. I’m running for reelection because there’s still work to be done.Just like my parents and grandparents on the family farm, when I commit tosomething, I see it through. Can you make a split donation of any amount todaybetween my campaign and Voter Protection Project to help me keep up the fightin Washington?(https://act.protectvoting.org/go/83981?t=1003&akid;=17887%2E878179%2EtbMk5w)I’ll leave you with one last truth about farming: Some years you get the rightamount of rain, and things work out really well. Other years, you get a wholelot less. That means it’s important to be prepared for any outcome, and tohave a support system by your side when things get difficult. We don’t knowwhat this campaign will look like, or what Republicans will throw our way overthese final few months. But with your support, we’ll be ready. I appreciateanything you’re able to pitch in. Thanks for your help, and I hope I make youproud. — Jon ------------------ Paid for by Voter Protection Projectwww.protectvoting.org Not authorized by any candidate or candidate'scommittee. 401 2nd Ave. S, Ste. 303, Seattle, WA 98104 Click here to requestfewer emails: https://act.protectvoting.org/signup/fewer-emails/?t=1001&akid;=17887%2E878179%2EtbMk5w Click here to unsubscribe:https://act.protectvoting.org/unsubscribe/unsubscribe/?akid=17887%2E878179%2EtbMk5w

name: Troy Downing
office: Former Member of the U.S. Air Force/Air National Guard
subject: From the scrapbooks (8 photos)
body: https://click.updates.troydowning.com/?qs=98348a78b232a2a12d05fbc8f6565ab290472fb8cd9a684d2ab530d0446ee511fa857f04aa412eb2d6da80f48371f32351f159420450c142Never could this young boy have imagined he'd one day be sending an email likethis. Peter, it's Troy Downing. If you don't have a lot of time,all you needto know about me is I only care about three things: God, family, and country.https://click.updates.troydowning.com/?qs=98348a78b232a2a12d05fbc8f6565ab290472fb8cd9a684d2ab530d0446ee511fa857f04aa412eb2d6da80f48371f32351f159420450c142I'm running for Congress to defend those three things for myself and everyAmerican.https://click.updates.troydowning.com/?qs=98348a78b232a2a12d05fbc8f6565ab290472fb8cd9a684d2ab530d0446ee511fa857f04aa412eb2d6da80f48371f32351f159420450c142Growing up, I was a bit of a nerd. I studied mathematics and computer sciencein college. Then I started my own business that merged with Yahoo!. I startedother small businesses in insurance and real estate, but then my life changedforever… Like millions of Americans, September 11th was a turning point in mylife. I immediately enlisted in the United States Air Force/ANG. I served twotours of duty in Afghanistan as part of a Combat Search and Rescue (CSAR)squadron.https://click.updates.troydowning.com/?qs=98348a78b232a2a12d05fbc8f6565ab290472fb8cd9a684d2ab530d0446ee511fa857f04aa412eb2d6da80f48371f32351f159420450c142https://click.updates.troydowning.com/?qs=98348a78b232a2a12d05fbc8f6565ab290472fb8cd9a684d2ab530d0446ee511fa857f04aa412eb2d6da80f48371f32351f159420450c142After eight years of service, I honorably discharged from the Air Force andreturned to my wife and kids back home in Montana.https://click.updates.troydowning.com/?qs=98348a78b232a2a12d05fbc8f6565ab290472fb8cd9a684d2ab530d0446ee511fa857f04aa412eb2d6da80f48371f32351f159420450c142We are partners in a local distillery in Bozeman and when the COVID pandemichit, our community went above and beyond to help our friends and neighbors.There were shortages of toilet paper, sanitizing wipes, and hand sanitizer inevery single store. We quickly turned our whiskey distillery into a handsanitizer production facility to provide free hand sanitizer to families,first responders, and hospitals.https://click.updates.troydowning.com/?qs=98348a78b232a2a12d05fbc8f6565ab290472fb8cd9a684d2ab530d0446ee511fa857f04aa412eb2d6da80f48371f32351f159420450c142In the Combat Search and Rescue (CSAR) Community, we live by this motto: Thesethings we do, that others may live. I've taken this motto with me ineverything I do. I've taught my kids to live by this. And now, my publicservice is not finished.https://click.updates.troydowning.com/?qs=98348a78b232a2a12d05fbc8f6565ab290472fb8cd9a684d2ab530d0446ee511fa857f04aa412eb2d6da80f48371f32351f159420450c142I'm running for Congress to preserve our American way of life, protect ourGod-given rights, and defend our nation with everything I've got.https://click.updates.troydowning.com/?qs=98348a78b232a2a12d05fbc8f6565ab290472fb8cd9a684d2ab530d0446ee511fa857f04aa412eb2d6da80f48371f32351f159420450c142I'm running for Congress for GOD, so we will never forget that we are onenation UNDER God. I'm running for Congress for our FAMILIES, so our kids haveevery open opportunity to succeed. I'm running for Congress for our COUNTRY,so every future generation can still call the United States of America theirhome and the best country that has ever graced God's creation.. Peter, thisrace won't come cheap. Democrats are chomping at the bit to flip Montana BLUEso they can turn our state into the next California! I can't let that happen,but I'm hoping strong faithed Patriots like you will help win this fight.https://click.updates.troydowning.com/?qs=98348a78b232a2a12d05fbc8f6565ab290472fb8cd9a684d2ab530d0446ee511fa857f04aa412eb2d6da80f48371f32351f159420450c142If you can spare just $5 or $10, that's all it takes to make a difference -seriously! I don't have billionaires on speed dial or Hollywood award winnersto campaign for me. I'm depending on like-minded friends and neighbors likeyou to chip in a few bucks.https://click.updates.troydowning.com/?qs=98348a78b232a2a12d05fbc8f6565ab290472fb8cd9a684d2ab530d0446ee511fa857f04aa412eb2d6da80f48371f32351f159420450c142If everyone reading this chips in $8, I'll hit my goal!https://click.updates.troydowning.com/?qs=98348a78b232a2a10c5681d57d3fa9073d100dfdc0f820917775d27fdd4d8ec7323bc7ced74f1651293b6a2a0c861ecf8725a9bf97c5eef1CHIP IN $8https://click.updates.troydowning.com/?qs=98348a78b232a2a16bf19c7769632ada8ac71211f13b899d69350d1c723578487d467c220e5ced5af6b5f3b62ed4e16ee2048b559763c220CHIP IN $10https://click.updates.troydowning.com/?qs=98348a78b232a2a1741158f43f2eac06762f1b1d58ab87fd7a922bd2676e4a6ab3f4493c5c0a50699ac3275b96e5386f076c253234c66818CHIP IN $20https://click.updates.troydowning.com/?qs=98348a78b232a2a1804376f4dbd0d61769eba471607419f86eb553c8b5002fe497fe96f6460d0c6527b664c82f9b31d7ec70330d2859fbf5CHIP IN $28https://click.updates.troydowning.com/?qs=98348a78b232a2a12d05fbc8f6565ab290472fb8cd9a684d2ab530d0446ee511fa857f04aa412eb2d6da80f48371f32351f159420450c142I appreciate any and all support. With your help, Peter, we can save ourcountry and put God, Family, and Country FIRST. God Bless, Troy Downing (R-MT)ELECTION COUNTDOWNhttps://click.updates.troydowning.com/?qs=98348a78b232a2a179aaab4f51fcea43cbfdd9b927133130c4adf89bc7822519d93363d532e8eda33879f08c3434be692f75a58edb1c1259Election Day is only a few short days away, and I need YOU to enlist in thefight. name: Mucarsel-Powell, D.
subject: Here's how we'll reach every voter
body: Friend — the path to victory in our race for Senate is talking to every lastFloridian, one voter at a time, across our entire state. Connecting withFloridians is probably my favorite part of this race. But it doesn't comecheap. Ours is a big state, and with Election Day mere days away at thispoint, we're in overdrive mode in our efforts to reach communities acrossFlorida. Your grassroots donation makes that voter contact and mobilizationpossible. When everyone chips in a $25, $50, or $100 donation, it means moreyard signs for our supporters. It means we can boost our efforts to recruitvolunteers and canvassers and get them the tools they need. It means our adsacross TV, radio, and digital airwaves stay up and counter Rick Scott's liesand attacks. We have just 72 hours left to deploy resources into the field —and with polls showing me locked in a dead heat with Rick Scott, every minutematters. But we're still $2,302,303 short of our last grassroots fundraisinggoal of the election. Please make a donation of $5 or whatever you can sparenow to help us get resources into the field, to help me reach more voters, andto defeat Rick Scott in Florida and save our Democratic Senate majority.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?amounts=5,25,50,100,250&refcode;=jtk2482-fr-text Thank you, Debbie -------- This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com.To unsubscribe from this email list, please click here:https://secure.ngpvan.com/p/7CGTHFDMeUWW_Wz2yFDujA2?unsubscribedata=YNNMHy4X%2Bz720JCPzwoPCJcAuJFxvnPbvuvcE14psNu36OaPssEjUwRVu90k2bVle9dTxValASrqYT5muHNWwqFQiIto%2FVDsqnuQIkBmRZtBecQYtpFxSgRUNKtPSNOz1UmTvx9KcU5bsknhY9U2NgWlgHJ4uTiJfAysiKZUoL9pWNoy7vm1u%2BvPIB89b2%2B638GEwq7H23QnudslSzKszknFg25YgyglhHqudoirnp%2Bf6X9aH1hhRhVUh6XqY3R%2Fy3S%2FBx0XcPj0eFPwVBzZcEcNTNmIZZoofdxz%2FgmoVFp%2B2XrNKCEARebETVz7OFW4WKadlC55HQ1LGbyXAhTxEJpZUz9vfMIqxRwAS69ClpZd8YRZb%2FiZcfyA3%2FzKvq5AmzSs0yRdNjYPowFlNrDuVXqoGspENje06fIiretdhq1nQrws0ZK1SpOKh%2BnhVGp%2FPaid for by Debbie for Florida. name: Cao Press Team
subject: Our Latest Newsletter
body: WEEKLY NEWSLETTER October 28th, 2024 A Note from CAPT Hung Cao USN (Ret) TeamCao – we’re just days away from Election Day! Remember, Virginia is in play,and we arethe key to flipping the U.S. Senate and fight with President Trumpto Save America. In the final days of the campaign, we continue to barnstormthe Commonwealth, highlighted by an amazingWin Virginia Rally with RNC Co-Chair Lara Trump and Governor Glenn Youngkin in Chesterfield County to kickoff our week. On Monday, I met with Liberty University College Republicans, Imade a quick stop at VIET NailSalon, and I spoke with the Chesterfield GOP onthe importance of beating Tim Kaine. On Wednesday, April and I were proud tocast our votes in Leesburg and last night, I walked in theannual LeesburgHalloween Parade. In case you missed it, you can check out some of thecostumesand pictures from the parade here. With just 3 days to go, our campaign isfull steam ahead, but we need your help! Makesure to get out to vote if youhaven’t already. - Hung Cao NEW ENDORSEMENT NFIB Endorses Hung Cao For USSenate The National Federation of Independent Businesses endorsed Hung Caofor US Senate. In theirendorsement, they said: "Capt. Hung Cao has shown hewill be a strong supporter of Virginia small businesses inCongress. Hiscampaign has focused on listening and supporting small business ownersand hehas pledged to support Main Street by ending government overreachandregulation. Cao will be a strong ally for our local communities and jobcreators, and weare proud to endorse him for election today." IN CASE YOUMISSED IT Hung’s Latest Opinion Piece: It's time to secure our southern borderHung wrote an op-ed in the Daily News Record about why securing the bordermust be a priorityand why he is running for U.S. Senate. Check it out here.Hung Joined Fox News Radio to Discuss the Last Stretch of the Race for SenateHung joined the Fox News Rundown to discuss his campaign to unseat Tim Kaine,and how wecan take back Virginia! Listen to the full interview here . HungJoined HRS WAVY in the Kitchen Hung joined WAVY’s Hampton Road Show to showhow to make fried rice, the first meal helearned from his mother, and share apart of his culture and family with Virginia. Watch the fullsegment here .Hung and April Voted Early On Wednesday, Hung and his wife April voted in the2024 election at the Office of Elections inLeesburg. After voting, Hung said,"April and I were proud to cast our votes in Leesburg today!With six days togo, Virginians are excited for new leaders that will save America.” Store Ifyou haven't picked up your Hung Cao gear yet, check out our online store!Social Media to Share Here are a few of our top posts from social media thisweek. Be sure to like and share, and when you tweet at Hung remember to use#TeamCao! That's it for this week, thank you for reading and see you on thecampaign trail! DONATE Be sure to follow Hung Cao on social media! TEXTHUNG TO 21412 Paid for by Hung Cao for Virginia Email sent todpwillis67@gmail.com by Hung Cao for Virginia PO Box 652 Purcellville VA 20134Unsubscribe here

name: Gretchen Whitmer
subject: Bright Hope in the Senate
body: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/loc_lbr_fr_q42024 [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/loc_lbr_fr_q42024] Hey folks – it’s Gretchen Whitmer, the governor of Michigan. As we get closer to Election Day, I wanted to shine a light on Lisa Blunt Rochester, the Congresswoman from Delaware. Right now, she is in a heated race to become Delaware’s next Senator. In a minute, I’ll explain why you should chip in to support Lisa’s historic campaign. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/loc_lbr_fr_q42024] SUPPORT LISA → [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/loc_lbr_fr_q42024] Lisa’s career as a public servant epitomizes the definition of what it means to be a leader and champion for everyone. Time and time again, she has helped create and pass meaningful legislation to build up our middle class, protect our seniors, and defend our voting and reproductive rights. In short, Lisa’s mission of Bright Hope is one she hopes to bring to the Senate. But her self-funding opponent would rather spend nearly a million dollars to keep his campaign afloat and defend the overturning of Roe. I wish I was joking on that last point. The scary thing about all of this is that Delaware will be crucial to the Democrats’ hopes of protecting their Senate majority. With a one-seat majority on the line, we need to do everything we can to lock this seat down and make Lisa the first Black and woman senator from Delaware. Folks – Election Day will be here before you know it. And in order to stop Trump, Vance, and Project 2025, we need to support Lisa Blunt Rochester by chipping in $10 or more to her campaign today. name: Team ODP
subject: The numbers we’re paying attention to

name: Jeff Merkley
subject: Get out and vote
body: Election Day is in just three days! We're seeing the energy and momentumbuilding on the ground, and with the election just days away, we need to makesure our friends, family, and neighbors get out and vote – or if you're votingby mail, turn in your ballots! In many states, you can also go to the pollsright now and early vote. If you need more information on how to get out andvote, use this link. [https://iwillvote.com/] There's a lot at stake in thiselection, and your vote is your voice. From making health care and housingmore affordable to safeguarding our democracy, there's too much on the line tosit out this year. Voting is the bedrock of our democracy, and by voting, wehave the power to determine the direction of our country's future. At theballot box, we can defeat Trump and put an end to his MAGA movement, so let'sget out and vote! Onward! Jeff Paid for by Jeff Merkley for Oregon. This emailwas sent by Jeff Merkley [https://www.jeffmerkley.com/] Jeff Merkley forOregon PO Box 14172 Portland, OR 97293 United States Email is an important wayfor Jeff Merkley to keep supporters like you informed about critical issuesand to build a winning grassroots campaign. Too much email? name: gotv@sherrodbrown.com

name: Rand Paul
subject: the leap has never been so important
body: For months, I’ve said the liberty movement has a very real possibility offlipping the Senate. Peter, For months, I’ve said the liberty movement has avery real possibility of flipping the Senate. 3 REASONS THE SENATE COULD FLIP🔴 Democrats have 3 seats to defend – all in states that voted for PresidentTrump in 2020 🔴 Democrats have 5 seats in states President Biden won by 3% orless 🔴 Voters historically vote for the same party for president and theSenate Democrats are forced to defend Joe Biden and Kamala Harris’ record ofwoke policies, crazy spending, weak foreign policy, and high inflation. Theresimply is no good way of spinning what’s transpired over the last three-and-a-half years. FLIP THE SENATE RED WITH RAND Peter, I know that our best daysare ahead of us, that we can secure a future of freedom, liberty, andprosperity – but all of that comes down to what we do between now and ElectionDay. Polls in many of the swing states indicate sitting Democrats are likelyto be voted out of office on November 5th.It’s our job to make sure we propelliberty candidates to victory and take back the Senate. We can do this,Peter. We’re SO close to saving our freedoms and protecting our rights. Iwon’t stop until the mission is complete until we have a pro-liberty Senatemajority. Take a leap for liberty. Chip in now to stand with me in this fight.STAND WITH RAND: $35 STAND WITH RAND: $50 STAND WITH RAND: $75 STAND WITHRAND: $100 STAND WITH RAND: ANY AMOUNT In liberty, Rand Paul Paid for byRand Paul for Senate P.O. Box 26352 Alexandria, Virginia 22313 This email wassent to dpwillis67@gmail.com Unsubscribe Contribution rules: * I am a U.S.citizen or lawfully admitted permanent resident (i.e., green card holder). *This contribution is made from my own funds, and funds are not being providedto me by another person or entity for the purpose of making this contribution.* I am making this contribution with my own personal credit card and not witha corporate or business credit card or a card issued to another person. * I amat least eighteen years old. I am not, nor am I making this contribution onbehalf of, a corporation, labor organization, national bank, foreign nationalwithout a green card, a federal contractor, or any other federallyimpermissible source.

committee: Democratic Association of Secretaries of State
name: Adrian Fontes
subject: re: Tuesday
body: Hi there, Arizona Secretary of State Adrian Fontes here. Without even knowingthe outcome of the November election, MAGA Republicans are preemptively sowingdoubt about the results in case their candidate loses. And they’re evencounting on election officials (like me and other Secretaries of State) tooverturn the results if they don’t get their way. Let me be clear: we’reelection administrators not politicians. I may be an elected official, but Ican separate my duty from my preference. I will always put the integrity ofour elections and the will of the people above partisan interests. With justdays until Election Day, we’re already seeing a surge in threats against ourelection officials. And the truth is, they’re only intensifying as extremistscontinue to spread misinformation and stoke fear. My friends at the DemocraticAssociation of Secretaries of State are monitoring these threats and aregearing up for up for attacks on election results, but they need support fromgrassroots Democrats like you. That’s why I’m asking you to make a small $3donation to the Democratic Association of Secretaries of State so they canelect democracy defenders across the nation.[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dasspac-q4-2024?refcode=em-11.2.24-all-2-rs]If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donationwill go through immediately:Chip in $10 Now[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dasspac-q4-2024?refcode=em-11.2.24-all-2-rs&express;_lane=true&amount;=10]Chip in $35 Now[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dasspac-q4-2024?refcode=em-11.2.24-all-2-rs&express;_lane=true&amount;=35]Chip in $50 Now[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dasspac-q4-2024?refcode=em-11.2.24-all-2-rs&express;_lane=true&amount;=50]Chip in $100 Now[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dasspac-q4-2024?refcode=em-11.2.24-all-2-rs&express;_lane=true&amount;=100]Chip in $250 Now[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dasspac-q4-2024?refcode=em-11.2.24-all-2-rs&express;_lane=true&amount;=250]Another amount[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dasspac-q4-2024?refcode=em-11.2.24-all-2-rs]Thank you, Adrian Fontes Arizona Secretary of State Thank you for yourdedicated support of The Democratic Association of Secretaries of State -- theonly organization dedicated to electing and protecting Democratic Secretariesof States. Right now, Republicans are changing the rules and changing theplayers to try and change the outcomes of future elections. DemocraticSecretaries of State are the last line of defense to protect our democracy andpreserve the will of the voters. It is a badge of honor that I wear with pride. But as the GOP scales up their attacks against me and rallies their MAGA base to turn out in droves, I need your help: [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/1561?c0=nov2024_abs_em.PGg-Nv&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_GEN_AC90_20241102_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&t;=1004&akid;=8130%2E5257348%2Er4TWUu ]With just 3 days until the election, will you pitch in $3 to help me keep fighting for our democracy from the United States Senate? And $3 helps us fight against the GOP’s many smears and efforts to silence me. Donald Trump, JD Vance, and other MAGA extremists do not want to see me in the Senate. name: John Fetterman
subject: It’s our choice, Pennsylvania
body: [1]John Fetterman Derek, This is Senator JohnFetterman. The election is days away and I know, as Pennsylvanians, we’retired of all the noise. Too many outsiders are looking at us and funding racesthey have no part of. But the thing is, they don’t get to decide what happenson November 5th. We do. Our State House in Pennsylvania is one seat away fromlosing a majority that’s been fighting for everyone in Pennsylvania to have aseat at the table. For every county to be heard and every community toadvance. And our opponents? They’ll take away a woman’s right to choose, raisetaxes on working families, and let a convicted felon dismantle our rule oflaw. Only we can send our majority back stronger than before and give theState House a majority that continues to work for the people of Pennsylvania.[ https://secure.actblue.com/donate/hdcc-fetterman?refcode=em20241102-9543&amount;=25&refcode2;=9543_434096_mZ7bX7&akid;=9543%2E434096%2EmZ7bX7]Will you pitch in $25 and join the fight today? [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/hdcc-fetterman?amount=25&refcode;=em20241102-9543&refcode2;=9543_434096_mZ7bX7&akid;=9543%2E434096%2EmZ7bX7]Donate » There’s a clear decision in front of us: Pennsylvania moves forwardor we lose our democracy. ❤️ John John Fetterman U.S. Senator fromPennsylvania This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. Email is the mostimportant way for us to reach you about opportunities to get involved. name: Donald J. Trump
subject: My final address to the nation?

name: Nella Domenici
subject: “Go out and vote Nella!”
body: Nella for Senate I want you to see President Trump’s remarks about me and our campaign during his rally in New Mexico this week. “Go out and vote Nella!” Peter – this was just part of President Trump’s remarks about me and our campaign during his rally in New Mexico this week. I really want you to see the whole thing. Please check this out! WATCH PRES. TRUMP’S NM REMARKS » —Nella Domenici ABOUT NELLA New Mexico is Nella Domenici’s home. She was born in Albuquerque and lived for most of her childhood in a home near the intersection of Lomas and Monroe with her seven siblings, and her parents - Pete and Nancy Domenici. Nella began her education at Our Lady of Fatima, where she learned the values she holds today. Nella is a proud third-generation New Mexican, devoted mother of two, step-mom of four, and the wife of a Navy Veteran. Nella’s family’s roots run deep in New Mexico and she and her husband Pat enjoy their family home in New Mexico that they have owned for nearly twenty years. Like most New Mexicans, Nella Domenici understands the importance of hard work. She waited tables to help pay for her undergraduate degree from Georgetown University, and worked her way through night school at Georgetown Law while holding down a full time job. She then graduated from Harvard Business School as a Baker Scholar, top 5% of the class, while 9 months pregnant. Nella began her career at the bottom and worked her way up through the complex finance world, eventually serving as CFO for one of the world’s largest, most successful investment firms. In her career, Nella advised, invested in, grew, and led many companies, and served on public company boards. The industries she has worked in are vast and include areas such as health care, AI, food service, lodging, commercial real estate, mortgage lending, and consumer products. These companies have ranged from small family-owned businesses, to rapidly growing venture backed enterprises, to a Fortune 200 company. Several of these have been headquartered in New Mexico. Collectively, the companies Nella has been heavily involved with have employed thousands of Americans. Like her father and mother, Nella has been a warrior for those who most need an advocate: for women competing in academics or business, for families dealing with mental illness, and for those without access to quality healthcare or education. JOIN NELLA Follow Nella Online Checks can be made payable to Nella for Senate and mailed to PO Box 92918 | Albuquerque, NM 87199 Paid for by Nella for Senate Don't want to receive any more of our emails? We hate to see you go: unsubscribe .

name: Jessica Mackler, EMILYs List
subject: The margin of effort.
body: Hi Peter! I don't want to interrupt your weekend, so I'll make this quick.With Election Day around the corner, right now is the most critical time tosurge support for EMILYs List women up and down the ballot. Let me explain:Over the past month, I've been on the ground in Michigan, Arizona, Nevada, anda few other key states. I've talked to voters, candidates, and volunteers allacross the country. And I can tell you firsthand that the polls and thepundits are right: our women's races will be close. There's a saying inpolitics, beloved by fundraisers and field organizers alike: the margin ofeffort. When the polls are tight, and a race could go either way, what mattersmost is the heart, grit, and commitment of the supporters. If we put in thework, we'll win. If we don't, we won't. It's that simple. Critical races likeVP Kamala Harris', Sen. Tammy Baldwin's (WI-SEN), and Rep. Susan Wild's(PA-07) now fall squarely within the margin of effort. And your support canhelp make sure we reach as many voters as possible before Nov. 5. Let's giveit all we've got, Peter. Donate now to surge support for Democratic pro-choicewomen in these critical final days:https://secure.actblue.com/donate/el-q42024-em Thanks for being part of thisteam, Jessica Mackler (she/her/hers) President, EMILYs List ---- PAID FOR BYEMILYS LIST WWW.EMILYSLIST.ORG AND NOT AUTHORIZED BY ANY CANDIDATE ORCANDIDATE'S COMMITTEE. View it in your web browser --- | | |  --- | | | About BlueAmp Action: We cannot sugarcoat the current situation. Right-wing authoritarianism, defeated by a worldwide coalition during WWII, was only in hibernation. Over the past decade it has infected democratic societies--including ours. It is as simple as it is terrifying: What we do now will define the future of our country and world. We at Blue Amp Action are dedicated to liberal, open societies, where reason and science are applied to solve our problems; where civil rights--including voting rights!--are protected for all. We fight for these values every day. Speaking up on our platforms, raising the voices and the political prospects of liberal pols and pundits. **And savvy grassroots activists like you know, just like we do, that we can’t stop watching the people we help elect:_ after the elections, we have to keep organizing support for the policies we like and pushing back against the ones we don’t._** **__When the public tunes out between elections and the only people our elected officials hear from are the paid lobbyists of wealthy corporations, our government stops being accountable to the needs of ordinary families.__** **Democracy never sleeps, and neither can we.** So we ask that you support our work, so we can continue to engage in this fight every moment of every day. So our kids grow up in democracy, not dystopia. Thank you for your support for all we do! Please follow Cliff Schecter on Twitter @cliffschecter, or subscribe to The Takedown with Cliff Schecter on YouTube, to keep up to date with this battle for the heart and soul of our country. — _You're getting this message because you’ve supported good causes and Democratic candidates. We need your support to continue fighting for our democracy. We love having you in our network, but if you no longer wish to hear from us, you canunsubscribe here._ --- | Paid for by Blue Amp Action PAC --- | | Unsubscribe or Manage Your Preferences ---

title: Join Dr. Raul Ruiz in Continuing His Service

content.value: The son of hardworking farmworkers, Dr. Ruiz grew up in Coachella, CA and learned at an early age that the key to attaining the American Dream is hard work and a great education.

In the summer of 1990, Raul walked in the desert heat from business to business in the Coachella Valley asking them to invest in their community by contributing to his education. With each investment for college, he made a promise to come back home and serve his community as a physician.

In 2012, he decided to take his service to the community to the next level by running for Congress. Dr. Ruiz needs our help to continue fighting for us in Congress and to flip the House blue this November.

footer.address: P.O. Box 1566 Indio, CA 92202 United States

name: Tim Sheehy
subject: We can’t run ads
body: Tim Sheehy for Montana Honestly, the money gap is so large that there is adistinct possibility that my opponent will block us on the airwaves. We'regoing dark, Peter - And it couldn’t come at a worse time. A new poll has meTIED with my opponent less than a week out from Election Day. If you don’talready know, here’s what happened. PLEASE LET ME EXPLAIN → “ "I SERVED AS ANAVY SEAL, BUILT ONE OF THE LARGEST AERIAL FIREFIGHTING COMPANIES IN AMERICACREATING OVER 200 MONTANA JOBS, AND STARTED A VETERAN-LED CATTLE RANCHING ANDFEEDING OPERATION. WHETHER IT WAS IN WAR OR BUSINESS, I SEE PROBLEMS AND SOLVETHEM. AMERICA NEEDS CONSERVATIVE LEADERS WHO LOVE OUR COUNTRY. I'M RUNNING FORTHE U.S. SENATE BECAUSE OUR CAMPAIGN IS ABOUT SERVICE, DUTY, AND COUNTRY — NOTPOLITICS AS USUAL." Unsubscribe PAID FOR BY TIM SHEEHY FOR MONTANA TimSheehy is a former Navy SEAL. Use of his military rank, job titles, andphotographs in uniform does not imply endorsement by the Department of theNavy or the Department of Defense.

name: Debbie Mucarsel-Powell
subject: Your chance to get to know me a little better
body: Peter — by now, with just 3 days until Election Day, I hope you have a goodsense of who I am and the issues I believe are so important. But I thought alittle reminder would be helpful, especially contrasted with who Rick Scott is🤮.Maybe it will even motivate you to make a donation before tonight'sfundraising deadline to ensure I can defeat Rick Scott! First and foremost,I'm everything I am today because of my mother. She brought my sisters and meto America when I was just 14. Mom knew we had to get out of Ecuador, whichwas transitioning to democracy after suffering under a military dictatorship.She knew America was the key to a better life. Well, with a whole lot of hardwork (including working in a doughnut shop to help my family get by), longhours, and a ton of hope, we were able to win our American dream. My story iswhat inspires me to give back to this incredible country and state that gaveme so much. After putting myself through college, I worked for severalnonprofit organizations across Florida, helping toprotect our wildlife andpreserve our coral reefs. Rick Scott, on the other hand, banned saying thewords "climate change" when he was governor of Florida, and the League ofConservation Voters gave him a whopping 0% score last year. During my timeworking at Florida International University, I spearheaded a new programtoexpand affordable health care access to more Floridians. But Rick Scott hasvoted to repeal the Affordable Care Act more times than I care to count. Andwho can forget he committed one of the largest Medicare frauds in the historyof our country. Eventually, I had the honor of serving my community in theU.S. House of Representatives, where I became the first South Americanimmigrant to be elected to Congress! In the House, I wrote the bill toexpandseniors’ Medicare Advantage coverage, worked with Republicans to provideeconomic relief to families and small businesses, andsecured $200 million forEverglades restoration. I'm proud of my record — but can Rick Scott say thesame, friend? He has used his time in office writing the plan to end SocialSecurity and Medicare, attempting to undermine our elections, attacking ourrights, and making it harder for working families to get ahead. As a result,Rick Scott's approval ratings with Floridians are underwater. Even a largepercentage of Republicans don't approve of him! Now, polling shows mestatistically tied with Scott, and in just 8 days, we can defeat him andprotect our Democratic Senate majority in the process. But with Rick Scottoutspending me 3-1 on the airwaves, it's going to take a surge in grassrootssupport from people like you to truly defeat him. So please, rush a donationof $5 or whatever you can to send me to the U.S. Senate and give Floridiansthe true leader and public servant we deserve! If you've saved your paymentinformation with ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately:RUSH $25 IMMEDIATELY RUSH $50 IMMEDIATELY RUSH $100 IMMEDIATELY RUSH $250IMMEDIATELY RUSH $500 IMMEDIATELY RUSH ANOTHER AMOUNT Thank you, DebbieDONATE Paid for by Defeat Boebert PAC This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com . Don't want to receive these emails anymore?UnsubscribeDefeat Boebert PAC,

name: Suzan DelBene
subject: If you want to know where your support has the biggest impact read this
body: Friend, I know you’re getting a lot of emails right now. But I’d greatlyappreciate it if you could take the time to read this one. I’m the Chairwomanof the Democratic Congressional Campaign Committee (DCCC) – the committeeresponsible with our efforts to win the House, a pro-choice woman with abackground in STEM like many of the candidates 314 Action is supporting, and aproud mom and grandma who wants to leave our kids a better country and planetthan we found it. That means flipping the House to secure a majority that willprotect their rights and their medical autonomy, act on climate, get weaponsof war off the streets, slash child poverty, safeguard our democracy, and keepthe American Dream within their grasp. Democrats are just 4 seats away fromflipping the House blue. But we’re facing a record level of spending by theGOP in this final stretch and polling couldn’t be tighter in the handful ofraces that will decide control of Congress. Your support today is what willmake these races break in our favor. That’s why I’m personally asking if youwill donate directly to 6 Democrats running in 6 toss-up Red-to-Blue Houseraces ahead of their deadlines tonight. If Christina Bohannan (IA-1), Dr.Amish Shah (AZ-1), Janelle Bynum (OR-5), George Whitesides (CA-27), JohnMannion (NY-22), and Tony Vargas (NE-2) win we have the numbers to flip theHouse blue. https://secure.actblue.com/donate/kl-email-241018-314?refcode=KL_ATA_EM_FR_314_241025_T1_2_b Christina Bohannan (IA-1) – Christina is anenvironmental engineer and law professor who defeated a 20-year incumbent tosecure a seat in the Iowa State Legislature. In 2020, Republicans flipped thisseat from blue to red by the slimmest margin of any House race in nearly anentire century – a margin of just 6 votes (0.01% of the vote). And pollingconfirms it could be just as competitive this November. Normington, Petts &Associates Poll: Bohannan 47% – Miller-Meeks 47% Dr. Amish Shah (AZ-1) – Amishis an Emergency Room physician at the Mayo Clinic of Arizona and StateRepresentative who had the most bills signed into law of any Arizona Democratof the past decade. In 2022, Republicans barely defended this seat by a marginof just 3,195 votes (which was less than 1% of the vote). It could be evencloser this time around. In 2020, Joe Biden won this district by 1.5%. ImpactResearch Poll: Shah 48% – Schweikert 48% Janelle Bynum (OR-5) – Janelle is anelectrical engineer, small business owner, and former State Representative whohas defeated Republican Lori Chavez-DeRemer (who she is now running against)not once but twice at the state level. In 2022, Republicans flipped this seatfrom blue to red by a razor-thin margin of just 2.1% of the vote. In 2020, JoeBiden won this district by 8.8% of the vote – one of the largest margins ofany House seat actively held by a Republican. Noble Predictive Insights Poll:Bynum 43% – Chavez-DeRemer 42% George Whitesides (CA-27) – George is anaerospace expert who served as the Chief of Staff for NASA under PresidentBarack Obama, served as CEO of the spaceflight company Virgin Galactic, andco-founded a group to address wildfire disasters. In 2020, Republicans flippedthis seat from blue to red by a razor-thin margin – just 333 votes (a marginof 0.1% of the vote). In 2020, Joe Biden won this district by a massive marginof 12.4% of the vote – more than almost any other House district currentlyrepresented by a Republican. University of Southern California Poll:Whitesides 48% – Garcia 46% John Mannion (NY-22) – John is a former scienceteacher who won a highly competitive State Senate seat on Republican turf byjust 10 votes to win a seat in the New York State Legislature. In 2022,Republicans barely defended this House seat by a razor-thin margin of just2,631 votes (which is less than 1% of the vote!). In 2020, Joe Biden won thisdistrict by a margin of 7.4% of the vote – which is part of the reason theNational Journal labeled this as the best red-to-blue pickup opportunity inthe United States! Tony Vargas (NE-2) – Tony is a former science teacher andschool board member who currently serves in the Nebraska State Senate. In2022, Tony fell just 5,856 votes (a margin of just 2.6% of the vote) offlipping this seat from red to blue. In 2020, Joe Biden won this district by amargin of 6.4% of the vote and it's only grown more Democratic since. The NewYork Times Poll: Vargas 49% – Bacon 46% If you've saved your paymentinformation with ActBlue Express, your donation will be automatically splitbetween Christina Bohannan, Dr. Amish Shah, Janelle Bynum, George Whitesides,John Mannion, Tony Vargas, 314 Action Fund, and Kristin Lyerly: EXPRESS DONATE$ https://secure.actblue.com/donate/kl-email-241018-314?express_lane=true&amount;=&refcode;=KL_ATA_EM_FR_314_241025_T1_2_b EXPRESS DONATE $https://secure.actblue.com/donate/kl-email-241018-314?express_lane=true&amount;=&refcode;=KL_ATA_EM_FR_314_241025_T1_2_b EXPRESS DONATE $https://secure.actblue.com/donate/kl-email-241018-314?express_lane=true&amount;=&refcode;=KL_ATA_EM_FR_314_241025_T1_2_b EXPRESS DONATE $https://secure.actblue.com/donate/kl-email-241018-314?express_lane=true&amount;=&refcode;=KL_ATA_EM_FR_314_241025_T1_2_b EXPRESS DONATE $https://secure.actblue.com/donate/kl-email-241018-314?express_lane=true&amount;=&refcode;=KL_ATA_EM_FR_314_241025_T1_2_b EXPRESS DONATE OTHERhttps://secure.actblue.com/donate/kl-email-241018-314?express_lane=true&refcode;= KL_ATA_EM_FR_314_241025_T1_2_bThank you, Suzan Contribute https://secure.actblue.com/donate/kl-email-241018-314?refcode= KL_ATA_EM_FR_314_241025_T1_2_b PAID FOR BY FRIENDSOF KRISTIN FOR WISCONSIN If you'd like to unsubscribe you can click here.[https://secure.ngpvan.com/p/z34FQfwYfUy93tutIJ7IUw2?unsubscribedata=DWk9uAMoQI3ULVwKhpkl6QNl3%2BvHASAp6FOOx6JSRm2MICjBI3xmq87aWJSJEoSW9o1cr9glKfTFG03woFE6%2Bx%2FN%2FoZaHF9M6Ikz1QUCvynfP5zOgmvbgA2yI%2B5OnGWquTFJS4Ub9kRuYajBn%2BBwWebr6udz2xZaNbw0F0mJhyCh4hUDeSDArkbA8i3brMCU1Pj07XtC%2BqK1LosKu2Xmcx6mY1rDGlkaefzQQtmnNfYOOT630RHaxY%2BpIV9clto0M6rCTihl08%2FbT8WSgOxJx%2FpNzhBsOj%2B1xnZEfuca612cr%2BwTO9o14Ga5d65zmOzqxsBYBJLHoJ7aJLm%2F4i05YnT004T%2ByOZRuuW5CS7o6AajMWl1b32QUNv%2FcfmT2%2BFBiT0FOSUl%2BT%2BQhzOAh9i928Qj2bfxsj6urHTzn5P%2FxaZSpi0JCZHxi3BbCJ4L5MRX]

title: Email from Georgia Democratic Party

data.text: Subject: Urgent Call to Action - Georgia Democrats Need Your Help!

We need your help to ensure that Georgia remains a beacon of democracy and progress. Our state is at a crucial crossroads, and with the upcoming elections, it’s more important than ever for each of us to step up and make a difference.
Your support will help us:🔹 Fight for fair elections and protect voting rights.🔹 Promote progressive policies that benefit all Georgians.🔹 Elect candidates who share our values and vision.

With your contribution, we can strengthen our grassroots efforts and build the momentum needed to secure a better future for Georgia. Every dollar counts and will be put to good use in supporting local campaigns and getting out the vote.

If you’d like to learn more about our initiatives or get involved, please visit our website [Georgia Democratic Party](https://georgiademocrat.org/) or follow us on social media for the latest updates.
Thank you for your continued support. Together, we can make a real difference in Georgia and beyond.

name: John James
subject: I’m truly humbled
body: I can’t thank you enough for all of your generosity over the course of thiscampaign. We CAN defend this seat and our House majority, but I need your helpone final time. Friend, As I prepare for on the ground mobilizing Republicanvoters, I can’t help but be extremely grateful and humbled. The outpouring ofsupport we’ve had over this campaign has been incredible. Even asthe radicalLeft has spent over $10 MILLION trying to defeat, we’ve stayed strong withevery challenge they’ve thrown at us. I can’t thank you enough for all of yourgenerosity over the course of this campaign. We CAN defend this seat and ourHouse majority, but I need your help one final time. This is the CLOSEST Houserace in the country, and control of the House could very well come down to us.Our majority has been the only firewall against total socialist control inthese past two years, and we can’t afford to lose it. With America’s future onthe line, can you pitch in one final time to help us WIN this race? HELP USWIN THIS Thank you, John James Paid for by John James for MichiganUnsubscribe Use of John James’ military rank, job titles, and photographs inuniform does not imply endorsement by the Department of the Army or theDepartment of Defense.

name: Ted Cruz
subject: I need you to read this ASAP
body: NRSC I cannot stress this enough – we need EVERY conservative patriot onboard! Peter, The latest poll in this must-win race is alarming. It haseveryone asking this question: If you missed the news last week, a newMorning Consult poll has Woke Radical Colin Allred UP OVER ME for the firsttime with a 1–point lead! We cannot take anything for granted right now. It'sneck and neck with just weeks to go. Colin Allred has been raising money handover fist ever since he entered the race to fund his campaign of absurd liesand dishonest attacks. Now, he's using the news of this poll to rally theliberal billionaires and his radical base to dump even more money into hiscoffers. We can't let the left BUY THIS SEAT on November 5th. Rush support tofuel our fight → HELP SAVE TEXAS! If we lose this seat, we can kiss anychance of taking back the Senate goodbye. And if we come up short AND KamalaHarris prevails in Texas – the polls show President Trump's lead is shrinking– we will lose the America we know and love for good! For the NationalDemocrats, there is no greater prize than Texas. If they win here, it willchange the political landscape in our state and our nation for generations tocome. Make your most generous possible contribution now. Don't wait untilit's too late. Together, united and strong as conservative patriots, I know wecan come out on top to hand the left a major defeat on Election Day. ForLiberty, Ted Cruz HELP SAVE TEXAS! If you want to help Republicans TAKE BACKTHE SENATE, text WIN to 55404 to receive mobile alerts! Message and data ratesmay apply. Text "STOP" to opt-out. T&C;/Privacy Policy. Paid for by the NRSC.Not authorized by any candidate or candidate's committee. www.NRSC.orgContributions to the NRSC are not deductible as charitable contributions forfederal income tax purposes. name: Hung Cao
subject: The end of the road
body: Fellow Patriot, I’m afraid we could be at the end of the road. I don’t mean tobe too negative, but Tim Kaine has a MASSIVE war chest, and I just don’t knowif we can overcome it. This is CAPT Hung Cao. I’m not a career politician likeTim Kaine. I’m a husband, a father, and a 25-year combat Naval Captain. I’malso running for Senate in what could be the biggest political upset inVirginia’s history I’m running against a 30+ year incumbent who has spent hisentire life serving Washington's special interests. Let’s just cut to thechase: I can’t do this alone. Can you pitch in to support my campaign? PITCHIN NOW I won’t lie, this is going to be an uphill battle, but I know thatwith you on our A-Team we can win this seat and take back the Senate. Our teamis gearing up for the upset of the century, and we want YOU to be a part ofit.Please, will you pitch in now to make sure we have the resources we need towin? SAVE OUR COUNTRY My wife and I are raising our children to grow up intohonest men and women, so you can trust that I’ll keep my promise to put ourCommonwealth and our country first in everything I do. In Liberty, CAPT HungCao USN (Ret) Paid for by Hung Cao for Virginia Use of military rank, jobtitles, and photographs in uniform does not imply endorsement by theDepartment of the Navy or the Department of Defense. name: Team JanePAC
subject: NYT: Zero climate progress over the past year.
body: “The U.N.’s Verdict on Climate Progress Over the Past Year: There Was None” -The New York Times, Oct. 24, 2024 Global climate action has stalled. Thelatest U.N. report shows that while fossil fuel pollution surged to a recordhigh last year, our governments are on track to miss the goals set in theParis Agreement by a wide margin — with warming predicted to reach 2.6–2.8°Cby the century’s end. Every fraction of a degree the planet warms meansdeadlier heat waves, more catastrophic wildfires, and a heartbreaking loss ofbiodiversity. We can’t let this future become our reality — and that’s whythis election matters so much. November 5th is our best shot to send a messagethat we won’t accept inaction from our leaders any longer. The U.S. has thepower to set a global standard. If we step up, we inspire other nations toact, too. But if we fail, it becomes harder for any country to hit the targetsneeded to keep our planet livable. Electing climate champions who we canactually urge to act could be the turning point. With just 3 days untilElection Day, we need to know: How urgent is it to you to elect climateleaders who are dedicated to following through on their climate promises?Select One: CRITICAL [https://secure.everyaction.com/TZ0XgoCvo0OC7FOTxztEyw2]VERY IMPORTANT [https://secure.everyaction.com/TZ0XgoCvo0OC7FOTxztEyw2]SOMEWHAT IMPORTANT [https://secure.everyaction.com/TZ0XgoCvo0OC7FOTxztEyw2]NOT IMPORTANT [https://secure.everyaction.com/TZ0XgoCvo0OC7FOTxztEyw2] Yourresponse matters because, right now, your voice and your vote will ensure wekeep our leaders accountable and elect climate champions who treat the climatecrisis with the urgency it deserves. Thanks for adding your voice, TeamJanePAC ---------------------- DONATE TODAY[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jane-bax-email] DONATE MONTHLY[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jane-bax-email?recurring=true] Followalong: https://www.facebook.com/JaneFondaClimatePAChttps://twitter.com/janeclimatepachttps://www.instagram.com/janefondaclimatepac/ Paid for by Jane Fonda ClimatePAC, not authorized by any candidate or candidate’s committee. subject: 3 reasons we need your support
body: ͏͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏George Latimer is alifelong Westchester resident who has built a career in public service bydelivering unparalleled progressive results for local residents. Now, he'staking that work to the next level by running to represent New York's 16thDistrict in Congress. If you’d like to unsubscribe, click here.[https://secure.ngpvan.com/p/-Phg2RhDIEGJVPbb5vK87g2?unsubscribedata=EsbwEF%2BBrws%2FEx0m5LgtceqQZ8yV56%2BLnmHLRHltgzn27D76G%2FXITOBQ4IrTzp1NFr8zcI%2BsXPrxc0roBBsm1XBtbl%2BroHrMwnyn3fOPJPD9LV5QWKtaPhwj2i3LGtpYhLOqsKee5HFDouXHiXCel69bM3KPU6gcUtAcWVOZqPa30XWCinCfU7Gmr89%2Bb4ayyR7O58O9bQnosH4f3KB7KPDxgsn0NMRa1B4G8Eo0Ed4EIvCpffiFZyP%2BjV3Ay8OuS3yczv5HFf5%2Bdsr3xJOOncrOIG2I9X%2BCzsTupldOFhwjOsPH4GAiiS7xTpjui6gQFFOYkAHDWdi8F3xy1IdDRJfJKxJj7K13eZe4gtj9bw0QTNpRg8Q3vOW5d7x%2BPiMljLxRpSnZfRizcHhDjf%2B1BdQDQtF3UIWhJtYB3r597MgsE6j6elvX%2FX56geOEJef9]# [#] Peter – we’ll be quick. We’re 3 days from Election Day, so here’s 3reasons why we need you to chip in $3 today to help us win NY-16: 1. NY-16needs a Congressman who will bring about actionable changes to improve thelives of those in New York’s 16th, and support Kamala Harris & Tim Walz’sagenda. 2. 3. George has dedicated over THREE DECADES of his life to servingthe people of New York State by focusing on real results, not rhetoric. 4. 5.The only way we’re going to be able to stay competitive is with a groundswellof local grassroots support. We can elect people who gain through division, orwe can elect people who are willing to get to work and help the people in ourcommunity who need it most. name: Debbie
subject: A watershed moment for this campaign
body: Friend, With just 3 days to go until Election Day, and mail-in voting well underway — against a backdrop of recovery after two major hurricanes — I wanted to give you an inside look at where we stand in our race to retire Rick Scott. While I usually wouldn't go into this much detail, I also wouldn't have made it this far without you, so it's only right that you should have full disclosure. But you also need to know that our midnight fundraising deadline is coming up, and I can't afford to fall short on my FINAL $4 million goal — so before we dig in, can I count on you to rush $10 now to split between me and Kirsten Gillibrand and keep me on track to reach my midnight goal and flip Florida blue? https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/gfs_dmp?refcode=jtk5620-bu-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Date: Nov. 2, 2024 Subject: [INTERNAL MEMO] The Case for Florida's Senate Race At this stage of the 2024 election, Debbie Mucarsel-Powell's race in Florida is now the Democrats' BEST SENATE PICKUP OPPORTUNITY nationwide: * Columnists at The Washington Post report that Rick Scott has failed to write as many of the “massive personal checks that he used to win the governor’s mansion." * Despite previously self-funding his races at historic levels, Rick Scott has never won an election in Florida by more than 1%. * Debbie's run a highly efficient ad campaign fueled by small-dollar donations, allowing her to reach 76% of voters across Florida's four top media markets. * Recent polls by a GOP-allied firm shows Scott's popularity is tanking by 11 points, and the race is in a DEAD HEAT at Scott 50 - Mucarsel-Powell 48. * Another advantage is the popular ballot initiative for restoring abortion rights, which is expected to help drive turnout similar to that of the 2020 election. * With a personal story that easily counters Scott's "socialism" attacks, and regular appearances on Spanish-language media, Debbie can rally Latino voters — nearly 1 in every 4 voters in Florida — unlike any other Senate candidate this cycle. The only thing left that Debbie needs to win is a sizable grassroots cash infusion over these final few days before the election. With it, she can help retain the Senate for Democrats, and bring new leadership to the Sunshine State. https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/gfs_dmp?refcode=jtk5620-bu-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 # # # So friend, now that you know where we stand in the race, there's just one thing left for me to ask you: Will you please chip in $10, $25, or any amount you can spare now to split between Kirsten Gillibrand and me and help to reach my very last $4 million goal on time, retire Rick Scott, and flip Florida's Senate seat blue? https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/gfs_dmp?refcode=jtk5620-bu-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Thank you for all you do. Let's win this, Debbie -------- This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. To unsubscribe from this email list, please click here: https://secure.ngpvan.com/p/46LjluwB30OIUfgIWihL4Q2?unsubscribedata=GqtbLxLfC7XOaITzmV7jLFHHUFaLihF4avkMU1lB8TDApMbG0JLinnlWM8ctd12OamcafCD6L4MLhyy6lxaS2v5KyMvKCq5I1hS0Cerao5uUsd%2Fq8%2BZ29NcCOP1Tzljz39TZxBvrgr2fPSBmiPTBDviwqFkbjlG%2FBWXm08rwUHI%2FMdypPhY7cELU8RccxzoxOWAHeFVKXch1nlM89JxvRHR8EweP0BswjxjTcGntzXGCsVkFnKPllURkK32%2FzjyXxwxfa4mugbuv7ugVAMUYSV1axkcBMkeaP5BKy%2FjTnJd4YDuNIvT9A3aGYGSWJ91fwv238Ee11yTph2hb7gdFCrZ2D3lyKMzhQjqNTWCWoPFIth55ZM7INMKbgDT%2BRqFFgK4%2FEP8r1hI3yAgfv5iVIEB9DqYKp%2F1QP3lSSvZ8gLI%3D © 2024 | Paid for by Gillibrand for Senate Gillibrand for Senate PO Box 150516 Brooklyn, NY 11215 United States

subject: Can you help my friend Yassamin Ansari make history?
body: Hi Peter, Mark Kelly here. I'm reaching out today to ask if you can help my friend Yassamin Ansari make history in just a few days? She's a former senior advisor for the United Nations and Vice Mayor of Phoenix. She has broken barriers her entire life, including becoming the first Iranian-American woman elected to public office in Arizona. Now, as the Democratic nominee for AZ-03, she's on the cusp of becoming the youngest woman in Congress and the first Iranian-American Democrat. And here's the thing, Yassamin isn't stopping at making history here in AZ-03. She and her team are working overtime to turn out Democrats across Arizona so that we can keep our state blue. Yass and her team know that if they turn out the vote here in AZ-03, we can elect Kamala Harris, Ruben Gallego, and deliver the Democratic trifecta we need to keep moving this country forward. If you're ready to make history and keep Arizona blue, please make a contribution to Yassamin's campaign today. name: Rebecca Cooke
subject: The good and the bad:
body: Peter, I wanted to update you on where things stand in WI-03 with somepositive news and some more concerning developments. But first, I have to ask:will you chip in to help us reach our final pre-election goal of raising$20,000 from grassroots supporters? We’re starting off well, but still have aways to go over the next couple of days.Donate>>https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cooke-q4-2024?refcode=em-11.2.24-all-1-aNow, the good news: We have an ever-so-slight lead in the latest polls in ourrace. Plus, election analysts have shifted the race slightly in our favor.These updates show the momentum we’ve built throughout this people-poweredcampaign. And I’m thankful for every single supporter who helped us get tothis point. But we can’t get complacent, Peter, because here’s the bad news:We are being heavily outspent by Derrick Van Orden and his extremist, deep-pocketed allies and super PACs. They’ve just doubled their ad buys in the mostcompetitive media markets in WI-03. That’s concerning because we need to winthose communities to prevail in three days. Here’s the bottom line: we need asurge of grassroots support NOW to counter Van Orden’s ad push and big-dollardonors as we enter the final stretch of this race. Will you contributewhatever you can today to help flip WI-03? What matters most is that we get asmany people donating as we can, because it adds up fast. Donate >>https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cooke-q4-2024?refcode=em-11.2.24-all-1-aThank you, Peter. Your support will help us win in three days. Rebecca ###Paid for by Cooke for Congress Cooke for Congress PO Box 1846 Eau Claire, WI54702 United States Rebecca Cooke is a small business and nonprofit leader whohas focused her career on building community and serving others. She was bornand raised on an Eau Claire dairy farm and was appointed by Governor TonyEvers to the Wisconsin Economic Development Corporation. District 32 might betough, but we’ve won tough races together before, Friend.https://secure.actblue.com/donate/pfaff-email?refcode=20241102_em_fr_b1_BP_NGP[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/pfaff-email?refcode=20241102_em_fr_b1_BP_NGP] Standing for our communities is workthat never stops, Friend. name: Trisha Calvarese
subject: I'm humbly asking
body: I am humbly asking you to give to my campaign to help me defeat Lauren Boebert. Yep, just $5. | _Unsubscribe_ ![](https://prod.cdn.everyaction.com/images/van/NGP/NGP50/1/111662/images/Calvarese-Logo-Email-620x115.png.png)  ![](https://actionnetwork.org/s3_files/uploads/data/000/934/296/original/Trisha_Headshot_square_copy.JPG) Peter, $5. That’s the amount I am humbly asking you to give to my campaign to help me defeat Lauren Boebert. Yep, just $5. $5 because last year, Adam Frisch lost to Lauren Boebert by just 546 votes. $5 because now Lauren Boebert has moved to my district, and I am the Democratic nominee running against her. $5 because the polling shows Boebert is still incredibly vulnerable and in danger of losing! And $5 because if we turn this seat blue, Democrats are almost guaranteed to take back the House – and that’s why Lauren Boebert and Speaker Johnson’s Super PACs are attacking me. I know $5 might not seem like much – and to be honest, it’s not. But over 75,000 grassroots donors like you have already chipped in to my campaign, and we are building a grassroots movement to defeat Lauren Boebert – $5 at a time. We cannot stop or let up now. Not when we are so close to giving Boebert the boot. My campaign has set a goal to raise another $30,000 to fight back and defeat Lauren Boebert, but we are still extremely far away with time running out before our critical fundraising deadline. **Please, can I count on you to make a donation to my campaign right now – no amount is too small – to help me defeat Lauren Boebert, flip this seat blue, and take back the House for Democrats?** _Please use the links in this email to start a weekly donation through ActBlue:_ | | | **DONATE $10** ---  | **DONATE $25** ---  | | **DONATE $35** ---  | **DONATE $50** ---  | | **DONATE $100** ---  | **Other Amount** ---  I have been so humbled by the massive outpouring of support my campaign hasgotten from people like you all across the country.But I’m not taking money from corporate PACs, so I need your continued supportnow if we’re going to win and finally defeat Lauren Boebert.Thank you – from the bottom of my heart,Trisha  ********Paid for by Trisha 4 ColoradoTrisha 4 Colorado PO Box 630633 Highlands Ranch, CO 80130Contributions or gifts to Trisha 4 Colorado are not tax deductible.This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. subject: GOOD NEWS about the Electoral College >>

name: Rand Paul
subject: the civil rights issue of our time
body: The education establishment has a track record of opposing anyone and everyonewho wants to diversify the education system. Peter, The educationestablishment has a track record of opposing anyone and everyone who wants todiversify the education system. They did it with the homeschool movement andargued parents were unfit to provide their children with a proper education.But when it came to test scores, homeschooled kids outperformed theircounterparts in public education. In fact, in every state where educationvouchers are available, public funding has increased, and test scores haveimproved… because competition works. Now, the education establishment is at itagain. This time, they’re dead set on preventing education dollars fromfollowing the student, whether that’s in a public school, private school,charter school, or homeschool.THIS IS WRONG >> Peter, I truly believeeducation freedom is the civil rights issue of our time. STAND WITH RAND:FIGHT FOR SCHOOL CHOICE Every child, regardless of their family’s income orzip code, deserves access to the best education possible—and that starts withvouchers. Greater competition means greater results, which directly benefitour sons and daughters. At the end of the day, the school choice movement isabout ensuring every child has his or her needs met, and that every child hastheir God-given ability to flourish and thrive.With education freedom, we canensure that’s a reality for every child, in every state. DEMAND EDUCATIONFREEDOM Peter, every day, I fight to protect our rights, freedoms, and theConstitution. Part of fighting for those rights includes ensuring parents havethe freedom to choose the best education for their children. Stand with me aswe address the civil rights issue of our time. body: 🌞 To all of Ruben Gallego’s supporters 🌵 We are asking you, humbly: Don’tclick away from this email. This is one of the last opportunities we have tobreak through before Election Day on Tuesday, so we’ll get straight to thepoint: We’re asking you to contribute to Ruben’s campaign before that deadlinehits. The vast majority of people who read this email won’t give; they’ll lookthe other way. We’re hoping you’re different. As a matter of fact, we need youto be different. As you read this, Ruben is being outspent on television inArizona. After months of missed goals, we haven’t raised what we need tocompete. Kari Lake has more resources at her disposal than we do, and we arefalling behind. The way we retake the momentum is you. If everyone readingthis donated just $5, we would not only fully fund our advertising in thisfinal week. We would not only receive a historic number of donations. name: Kamala Harris
subject: Asking you to donate $47 before midnight tonight.
body: This is the most consequential election of our lifetime. | | |                                                                                                                                    --- ![Harris forPresident](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/111/764/original/HFP-Walz-SingleColor-HarrisBlue.png) ![Joe Biden](https://actionnetwork.org/s3_files/uploads/data/000/946/902/original/kamala_hopeful.jpg) Hi, Peter I am reaching out to ask you to make a donation to our campaign before our midnight deadline. Let me explain why: As you read this, Trump and his right-wing allies are outspending us on ads attacking my character and values. They are running them in crucial swing states like Pennsylvania, Georgia, and North Carolina. _States that we need to win._ I do not lose sleep over what an unhinged and unstable man thinks about me. What _does_ keep me up at night, is what is at stake in this election and the thought of undecided voters seeing his hate-fueled message before we have a chance to correct the record. **We can and must reach these voters -- and that takes significant resources.** Peter, it looks like you are still waiting for the best moment to donate to our campaign. Will you make today the day you chip in your first $47 or $75? Representing Pennsylvania with a contribution is one of the most meaningful actions you can take in the final days of this election. _If you've saved payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately:_ | | $47 >> --- | $75 >> --- | $100 >> --- | $250 >> --- | $500 >> --- | Other >> ---  Donald Trump is counting on us to lose momentum.I refuse to give him that satisfaction. And from what I know about thisgrassroots team, you will not either.We are still the underdogs in this race. We are going to win, and it is goingto take grassroots supporters like you joining our fight with a donation tomake it happen.That is why I lean on you a bit more on days like today, Peter.Please use this link to chip in $47 ahead of our campaign’s midnightfundraising deadline. Your $47 donation right now -- not tomorrow, not the dayafter, but today -- will directly fund our work to reach and win overpersuadable voters in these final three days.This is the most consequential election of our lifetime. It would mean theworld to me to see your name on our list of donors for the first time.KamalaKamala Harris Vice President of the United States          * * *| | DONATE --- | TAKE ACTION --- | SHOP ---  * * *This email was sent to **dpwillis67@gmail.com**. Thank you so much for being asupporter. But Peter, we don't want to bother you. If you’d like tounsubscribe from all Harris for President emails, you can **click here**. Wesincerely thank you for your help and support. Paid for by Harris forPresident. ---  ![](https://click.contact.kamalaharris.com/ss/o/u001.ZbNyqOfLYPaP-d23SgKjnQ/4b4/J_ednWCiR56wgtsnC8zVfA/ho.gif)

name: Jacky Rosen
subject: I hate to reach out like this
body: Oy vey! I hate to reach out like this, but I’m about to walk into an emergencybudget meeting with some difficult news. After seeing new waves of GOP attackads against me, I OK’d new ad buys (even though we didn’t have the budget forit). And now, we don’t have the resources to keep our ads live. Can you rush$5 to help me combat the GOP’s false attacks by keeping our own ads on theair?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/rosenfornevada_email_1124?refcode=jtk5365-fr-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 Unlike Trump and my opponent, Sam Brown, I’lltake grassroots support over billionaires and special interests every time.But we need a surge of donations today if we want to execute our winningstrategy on the airwaves. The stakes are high, team. Republicans and theiroutside groups are pouring MILLIONS into these TV and digital ads. So if wescale back our program, my campaign risks being completely drowned out. Inorder to keep them going strong, we need to reach my $250,000 midnightfundraising goal. In a race that will decide Senate control, we can’t affordto fall behind any more. So I’m humbly asking, friend: Can you rush a $5donation before I step into this meeting so we don’t have to cut any ads?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/rosenfornevada_email_1124?refcode=jtk5365-fr-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 Thank you, Sen. subject: Listen to Jamie Raskin!!!
body: LOOK!!! LOOK!!! LOOK!!! subject: I've taken some big hits before
body: Friend, I've taken some big hits before – and I've got a plate and two screwsin my neck from my time in the NFL to prove it. But falling short of mymidnight fundraising goal in what is turning out to be the best opportunity tofire Ted Cruz also hurts. Right now, we have a chance to make sure Ted Cruztakes the biggest hit of his career – and create massive change in Texas andacross the country – but I can't do it without your help. name: Bob Casey
subject: An important update on my Senate race
body: Hello, friends. There are just 3 days left, and I wanted to reach out with animportant update on this Senate race. First, can you split $10 between mycampaign and Ashley Ehasz? DONATE [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/eha-email-split-bobcasey?refcode=em_fl_eha_20241102_ta_caseyupdate_surr_xx_30da_xx_pt] A fewdays ago, a poll showed me trailing my Trump-endorsed opponent for the firsttime. Next, experts at the Cook Political Report moved my race to a “Toss Up.”National Republicans see this race as one of their best opportunities toretake control of the Senate, and they’re outspending us in the final days. Ifwe lose this race, Democrats will likely lose control of the Senate and theWhite House. With workers’ rights, women’s rights, and voting rights on theline, we cannot afford for that to happen. So please, split $10 between mycampaign and Ashley Ehasz right now to help reach our final goal and electDemocrats in Pennsylvania.
